◆ getUniqueID()

void CanTask::getUniqueID ( uint8_t out[uavcan_node_GetInfo_Response_1_0_unique_id_ARRAY_CAPACITY_],
uint64_t serNumb )
staticprivate

Ritorna unique-ID 128-bit del nodo locale. E' utilizzato in uavcan.node.GetInfo.Response e durante plug-and-play node-ID allocation da uavcan.pnp.NodeIDAllocationData. SerialNumber, Produttore.. Dovrebbe essere verificato in uavcan.node.GetInfo.Response per la verifica non sia cambiato Nodo. Al momento vengono inseriti 2 BYTE fissi, altri eventuali, che Identificano il Tipo Modulo.

Parameters
outdata out UniqueID
serNumblocal Hardware Serial Number (64Bit) Already Send in PNP 1.0 Request (Hash 48Bit)

Definition at line 89 of file can_task.cpp.

90{
91 // A real hardware node would read its unique-ID from some hardware-specific source (typically stored in ROM).
92 // This example is a software-only node so we store the unique-ID in a (read-only) register instead.
93 static uavcan_register_Value_1_0 val = {0};
94 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_unstructured_(&val);
95
96 // Crea default unique_id con 8 BYTES From local_serial Number (N.B. serNumb[0] rappresenta Tipo Nodo )
97 uint8_t *ptrData = (uint8_t*)&serNumb;
98 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 8; i++)
99 {
100 val.unstructured.value.elements[val.unstructured.value.count++] = ptrData[i];
101 }
102 // Il resto dei 128 vengono impostati RANDOM
103 for (uint8_t i = val.unstructured.value.count; i < uavcan_node_GetInfo_Response_1_0_unique_id_ARRAY_CAPACITY_; i++)
104 {
105 val.unstructured.value.elements[val.unstructured.value.count++] = (uint8_t) rand(); // NOLINT
106 }
107 localRegisterAccessLock->Take();
108 localRegister->read(REGISTER_UAVCAN_UNIQUE_ID, &val);
109 localRegisterAccessLock->Give();
110 LOCAL_ASSERT(uavcan_register_Value_1_0_is_unstructured_(&val) &&
111 val.unstructured.value.count == uavcan_node_GetInfo_Response_1_0_unique_id_ARRAY_CAPACITY_);
112 memcpy(&out[0], &val.unstructured.value, uavcan_node_GetInfo_Response_1_0_unique_id_ARRAY_CAPACITY_);
113}

void CanTask::HW_CAN_Power ( CAN_ModePower ModeCan)

Definition at line 45 of file can_task.cpp.

45 {
46 // Normal Mode (TX/RX Full functionally)
47 if(ModeCan == CAN_ModePower::CAN_INIT) {
48 canPower = ModeCan;
49 digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, LOW);
50 digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, LOW);
51 // Waiting min of 5 uS for Full Operational Setup bxCan && Hal_Can_Init
52 delayMicroseconds(10);
53 digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, HIGH);
54 digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_EN, HIGH);
55 }
56 // Exit if state is the same
57 if (canPower == ModeCan) return;
58 // Normal Mode (TX/RX Full functionally)
59 if(ModeCan == CAN_ModePower::CAN_NORMAL) {
60 digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, HIGH);
61 delayMicroseconds(10);
62 digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_EN, HIGH);
63 // Waiting min of 65 uS for Full Operational External CAN Power Circuit
64 // Perform secure WakeUp Timer with 100 uS
65 delayMicroseconds(90);
66 }
67 // Listen Mode (Only RX circuit enabled for first paket data)
68 if(ModeCan == CAN_ModePower::CAN_LISTEN_ONLY) {
69 digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_EN, LOW);
70 delayMicroseconds(10);
71 digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, HIGH);
72 }
73 // Sleep (Turn OFF HW and enter sleep mode TJA1443)
74 if(ModeCan == CAN_ModePower::CAN_SLEEP) {
75 digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, LOW);
76 delayMicroseconds(10);
77 digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_EN, HIGH);
78 }
79 // Saving state
80 canPower = ModeCan;
81}

503 // bool Per assert mancanza handler di eventuale servizio sottoscritto
504 bool bKindMessageProcessed = false;
505 // Gestione dei messaggi PNP per allocazione nodi di rete (gestisco come master)
506 if (transfer->metadata.port_id == uavcan_pnp_NodeIDAllocationData_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_)
507 {
508 // Richiesta di allocazione Nodo dalla rete con messaggio anonimo V1.0 CAN_MTU 8
509 bKindMessageProcessed = true;
510 uint8_t defaultNodeId = 0;
511 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
512 uavcan_pnp_NodeIDAllocationData_1_0 msg = {0};
513 if (uavcan_pnp_NodeIDAllocationData_1_0_deserialize_(&msg, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
514 {
515 // Segnalo a LCD PnP request da un nodo della rete UAVCAN
516 localSystemStatusLock->Take();
517 localSystemStatus->flags.pnp_request = msg.unique_id_hash & 0xFF;
518 localSystemStatusLock->Give();
519 // Cerco nei moduli conosciuti (in HASH_UNIQUE_ID) invio il tipo modulo...
520 // Verifico se ho un nodo ancora da configurare come da cfg del master
521 // Il nodo deve essere compatibile con il tipo di modulo previsto da allocare
522 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("RX PNP Allocation message request from -> "));
523 switch(msg.unique_id_hash & 0xFF) {
524 case Module_Type::th:
525 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Anonimous module TH"));
526 defaultNodeId = clCanard.getPNPValidIdFromNodeType(Module_Type::th, msg.unique_id_hash);
527 break;
528 case Module_Type::rain:
529 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Anonimous module RAIN"));
530 defaultNodeId = clCanard.getPNPValidIdFromNodeType(Module_Type::rain, msg.unique_id_hash);
531 break;
532 case Module_Type::wind:
533 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Anonimous module WIND"));
534 defaultNodeId = clCanard.getPNPValidIdFromNodeType(Module_Type::wind, msg.unique_id_hash);
535 break;
536 case Module_Type::radiation:
537 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Anonimous module RADIATION"));
538 defaultNodeId = clCanard.getPNPValidIdFromNodeType(Module_Type::radiation, msg.unique_id_hash);
539 break;
540 case Module_Type::vwc:
541 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Anonimous module VWC"));
542 defaultNodeId = clCanard.getPNPValidIdFromNodeType(Module_Type::vwc, msg.unique_id_hash);
543 break;
544 case Module_Type::power:
545 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Anonimous module POWER"));
546 defaultNodeId = clCanard.getPNPValidIdFromNodeType(Module_Type::power, msg.unique_id_hash);
547 break;
548 default:
549 // PNP Non gestibile
550 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Anonimous module Unknown"));
551 defaultNodeId = GENERIC_BVAL_UNDEFINED;
552 break;
553 }
554 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F(" [Serial Number HASH ID: %lu]\r\n"), (uint32_t) msg.unique_id_hash);
555 // Risposta immediata diretta (Se nodo ovviamente è riconosciuto...)
556 // Non utilizziamo una Response in quanto l'allocation è sempre un messaggio anonimo
557 // I metadati del trasporto sono come quelli riceuti del transferID quindi è un messaggio
558 // che si comporta parzialmente come una risposta (per rilevamento remoto hash/transfer_id)
559 if(defaultNodeId == GENERIC_BVAL_UNCOERENT) {
560 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("PNP Allocation incoerent with Master configuration for reques [ %s ]\r\n"), ABORT_STRING);
561 }
562 else if(defaultNodeId <= CANARD_NODE_ID_MAX) {
563 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Try PNP Allocation with Node_ID -> %d\r\n"), defaultNodeId);
564 // Se il nodo proposto viene confermato inizieremo a ricevere heartbeat
565 // da quel nodeId. A questo punto in Heartbeat settiamo il flag pnp.configure()
566 // che conclude la procedura con esito positivo.
567 msg.allocated_node_id.count = 1;
568 msg.allocated_node_id.elements[0].value = defaultNodeId;
569 // The request object is empty so we don't bother deserializing it. Just send the response.
570 uint8_t serialized[uavcan_pnp_NodeIDAllocationData_1_0_SERIALIZATION_BUFFER_SIZE_BYTES_] = {0};
571 size_t serialized_size = sizeof(serialized);
572 const int8_t res = uavcan_pnp_NodeIDAllocationData_1_0_serialize_(&msg, &serialized[0], &serialized_size);
573 // Preparo la pubblicazione anonima in risposta alla richiesta anonima
574 const CanardTransferMetadata meta = {
575 .priority = CanardPriorityNominal,
576 .transfer_kind = CanardTransferKindMessage,
577 .port_id = uavcan_pnp_NodeIDAllocationData_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_,
578 .remote_node_id = CANARD_NODE_ID_UNSET,
579 .transfer_id = (CanardTransferID) (transfer->metadata.transfer_id),
580 };
581 clCanard.send(MEGA, &meta, serialized_size, &serialized[0]);
582 }
583 }
584 }
585 // Gestione dei messaggi Heartbeat per stato rete (gestisco come master)
586 else if (transfer->metadata.port_id == uavcan_node_Heartbeat_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_)
587 {
588 bKindMessageProcessed = true;
589 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
590 uavcan_node_Heartbeat_1_0 msg = {0};
591 if (uavcan_node_Heartbeat_1_0_deserialize_(&msg, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
592 {
593 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("RX HeartBeat from node %u\r\n"), transfer->metadata.remote_node_id);
594 // Processo e registro il nodo: stato, OnLine e relativi flag
595 uint8_t queueId = clCanard.getSlaveIstanceFromId(transfer->metadata.remote_node_id);
596 // Se nodo correttamente allocato e gestito (potrebbe essere Yakut non registrato)
597 if (queueId != GENERIC_BVAL_UNDEFINED) {
598 // Accodo i dati letti dal messaggio (Nodo -> OnLine) verso la classe
599 clCanard.slave[queueId].heartbeat.set_online(NODE_OFFLINE_TIMEOUT_US,
600 msg.vendor_specific_status_code, msg.health.value, msg.mode.value, msg.uptime);
601 localSystemStatusLock->Take();
602 // Controllo sequenza heartbeat con il rolling a 0
603 if((++localSystemStatus->data_slave[queueId].heartbeat_transf_id != transfer->metadata.transfer_id) && (transfer->metadata.transfer_id)) {
604 localSystemStatus->data_slave[queueId].heartbeat_rx_err++;
605 }
606 localSystemStatus->data_slave[queueId].heartbeat_rx++;
607 localSystemStatus->data_slave[queueId].heartbeat_transf_id = transfer->metadata.transfer_id;
608 localSystemStatusLock->Give();
609 // Controlla se il modulo è ready (configurato) Altrimenti avvio la configurazione...
610 if(!clCanard.slave[queueId].heartbeat.get_module_ready()) {
611 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Module slave [ %u ] is not (ready) configured\r\n"), transfer->metadata.remote_node_id);
612 localSystemStatusLock->Take();
613 localSystemStatus->flags.run_module_configure = true;
614 localSystemStatusLock->Give();
615 }
616 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Power mode status node %u [ %s ]\r\n"), transfer->metadata.remote_node_id,
617 clCanard.slave[queueId].heartbeat.get_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on ? "full power" : "deep sleep");
618 // Rientro in OnLINE da OFFLine o Init Gestino può (dovrebbe) essere esterna alla Call
619 // Inizializzo le variabili e gli stati necessari per Reset e corretta gestione
620 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].is_entered_online()) {
621 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Node is now entered ONLINE !!!\r\n"));
622 // Metto i Flag in sicurezza, laddove dove non eventualmente gestito
623 clCanard.slave[queueId].command.reset_pending();
624 clCanard.slave[queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
625 clCanard.slave[queueId].file_server.reset_pending();
626 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending();
627 // Set system_status from local to static access (Set Node Online)
628 localSystemStatusLock->Take();
629 localSystemStatus->data_slave[queueId].is_online = true;
630 localSystemStatus->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_istant = 0; // Force get istant data for display
631 localSystemStatusLock->Give();
632 }
633 }
634 }
635 }
636 #ifdef USE_SUB_PUBLISH_SLAVE_DATA
637 else
638 {
639 // Gestione messaggi pubblicazione dati dei moduli slave (gestisco come master)
640 // Es. popalamento dati se attivato un log specifico o show valori su display
641 // Il comando è opzionale perchè in request/response esiste già questa possibilità
642 // Nodo rispondente leggo dalla coda la/le pubblicazioni attivate (MAX 1 x tipologia)
643 uint8_t queueId = clCanard.getSlaveIstanceFromId(transfer->metadata.remote_node_id);
644 // Se nodo correttammente allocato e gestito
645 if (queueId != GENERIC_BVAL_UNDEFINED) {
646 // Verifico se risposta del servizio corrisponde al chiamante (eventuali + servizi sotto...)
647 // Gestione di tutti i servizi possibili allocabili, valido per tutti i nodi
648 if (transfer->metadata.port_id == clCanard.slave[queueId].publisher.get_subject_id())
649 {
650 // ************* Service Modulo TH Response *************
651 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::th) {
652 // Processato il messaggio con il relativo Handler. OK
653 bKindMessageProcessed = true;
654 // Modulo TH, leggo e deserializzo il messaggio in ingresso
655 rmap_module_TH_1_0 msg = {0};
656 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
657 if (rmap_module_TH_1_0_deserialize_(&msg, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
658 {
659 // msg contiene i dati di blocco pubblicati
660 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Ricevuto dato in publisher modulo_th -> ID: %d, transfer ID: %d\r\n"),
661 transfer->metadata.remote_node_id, transfer->metadata.transfer_id);
662 }
663 }
664 // ALTRI MODULI DA INSERIRE QUA... PG, VV, RS, GAS ECC...
665 }
666 }
667 }
668 #endif
669 // Mancanza di handler per un servizio sottoscritto
670 if (!bKindMessageProcessed)
671 {
672 // Gestione di un messaggio sottoscritto senza gestione. Se arrivo quà è un errore di sviluppo
673 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
674 }
675 }
676 // Gestione delle richieste esterne
677 else if (transfer->metadata.transfer_kind == CanardTransferKindRequest)
678 {
679 if (transfer->metadata.port_id == uavcan_node_GetInfo_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_)
680 {
681 // The request object is empty so we don't bother deserializing it. Just send the response.
682 const uavcan_node_GetInfo_Response_1_0 resp = processRequestNodeGetInfo();
683 uint8_t serialized[uavcan_node_GetInfo_Response_1_0_SERIALIZATION_BUFFER_SIZE_BYTES_] = {0};
684 size_t serialized_size = sizeof(serialized);
685 const int8_t res = uavcan_node_GetInfo_Response_1_0_serialize_(&resp, &serialized[0], &serialized_size);
686 if (res >= 0) {
687 clCanard.sendResponse(MEGA, &transfer->metadata, serialized_size, &serialized[0]);
688 }
689 }
690 else if (transfer->metadata.port_id == uavcan_register_Access_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_)
691 {
692 uavcan_register_Access_Request_1_0 req = {0};
693 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
694 TRACE_INFO_F(F("<<-- Ricevuto richiesta accesso ai registri\r\n"));
695 if (uavcan_register_Access_Request_1_0_deserialize_(&req, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
696 {
697 const uavcan_register_Access_Response_1_0 resp = processRequestRegisterAccess(&req);
698 uint8_t serialized[uavcan_register_Access_Response_1_0_SERIALIZATION_BUFFER_SIZE_BYTES_] = {0};
699 size_t serialized_size = sizeof(serialized);
700 if (uavcan_register_Access_Response_1_0_serialize_(&resp, &serialized[0], &serialized_size) >= 0) {
701 clCanard.sendResponse(MEGA, &transfer->metadata, serialized_size, &serialized[0]);
702 }
703 }
704 }
705 else if (transfer->metadata.port_id == uavcan_register_List_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_)
706 {
707 uavcan_register_List_Request_1_0 req = {0};
708 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
709 TRACE_INFO_F(F("<<-- Ricevuto richiesta lettura elenco registri\r\n"));
710 if (uavcan_register_List_Request_1_0_deserialize_(&req, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
711 {
712 uavcan_register_List_Response_1_0 resp;
713 resp.name = localRegister->getNameByIndex(req.index);
714 uint8_t serialized[uavcan_register_List_Response_1_0_SERIALIZATION_BUFFER_SIZE_BYTES_] = {0};
715 size_t serialized_size = sizeof(serialized);
716 if (uavcan_register_List_Response_1_0_serialize_(&resp, &serialized[0], &serialized_size) >= 0) {
717 clCanard.sendResponse(CANARD_REGISTERLIST_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC, &transfer->metadata, serialized_size, &serialized[0]);
718 }
719 }
720 }
721 else if (transfer->metadata.port_id == uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_1_1_FIXED_PORT_ID_)
722 {
723 uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Request_1_1 req = {0};
724 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
725 TRACE_INFO_F(F("<<-- Ricevuto comando esterno\r\n"));
726 if (uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Request_1_1_deserialize_(&req, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
727 {
728 const uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Response_1_1 resp = processRequestExecuteCommand(clCanard, &req, transfer->metadata.remote_node_id);
729 uint8_t serialized[uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Response_1_1_SERIALIZATION_BUFFER_SIZE_BYTES_] = {0};
730 size_t serialized_size = sizeof(serialized);
731 if (uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Response_1_1_serialize_(&resp, &serialized[0], &serialized_size) >= 0) {
732 clCanard.sendResponse(MEGA, &transfer->metadata, serialized_size, &serialized[0]);
733 }
734 }
735 }
736 else if (transfer->metadata.port_id == uavcan_file_Read_1_1_FIXED_PORT_ID_)
737 {
738 // La funzione viene eseguita solo con UPLOAD Sequenza corretta
739 // Serve a fare eseguire un'eventuale TimeOut su procedura non corretta
740 // Ed evitare blocchi non coerenti... Viene gestita senza problemi
741 // Send multiplo di File e procedure in sequenza ( Gestito TimeOut di Request )
742 uint8_t queueId = clCanard.getSlaveIstanceFromId(transfer->metadata.remote_node_id);
743 // Devo essere in aggiornamento per sicurezza!!! O al massimo con verifica del comando
744 if((clCanard.slave[queueId].file_server.get_state() == clCanard.state_uploading) ||
745 (clCanard.slave[queueId].file_server.get_state() == clCanard.command_wait)) {
746 // Update TimeOut (Comunico request OK al Master, Slave sta scaricando)
747 // Se Slave si blocca per TimeOut, esco dalla procedura dove gestita
748 clCanard.slave[queueId].file_server.start_pending(NODE_REQFILE_TIMEOUT_US);
749 uavcan_file_Read_Request_1_1 req = {0};
750 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
751 if (uavcan_file_Read_Request_1_1_deserialize_(&req, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
752 {
753 uavcan_file_Read_Response_1_1 resp = {0};
754 byte dataBuf[uavcan_primitive_Unstructured_1_0_value_ARRAY_CAPACITY_];
755 // Terminatore di sicurezza
756 req.path.path.elements[req.path.path.count] = 0;
757 // Allego il blocco dati se presente
758 size_t dataLen = uavcan_primitive_Unstructured_1_0_value_ARRAY_CAPACITY_;
759 // N.B. uavcan_primitive_Unstructured_1_0_value_ARRAY_CAPACITY_ == FILE_GET_DATA_BLOCK_SIZE (256 BYTES)
760 #if uavcan_primitive_Unstructured_1_0_value_ARRAY_CAPACITY_ != FILE_GET_DATA_BLOCK_SIZE
761 #error Buffer file queue isn't equal to uavcan_primitive_Unstructured_1_0_value_ARRAY_CAPACITY_
762 #endif
763
764 // ************************************************************************
765 // GET Data File (Firmware) from SD CARD Queue
766 // ************************************************************************
767 bool file_download_error = false;
768
769 if(!localSystemStatus->flags.sd_card_ready) {
770 file_download_error = true;
771 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("File server: Reject request uploading file. SD CARD not ready [ %s ]\r\n"), ERROR_STRING);
772 } else {
773 // Is first block? Perform an request to open file with name into task sd card
774 if((req.offset / FILE_GET_DATA_BLOCK_SIZE) == 0) {
775 // First block NAME OF FILE (Prepare queue GET struct with file_name and start position)
776 memset(&firmwareDownloadChunck, 0, sizeof(file_get_request_t));
777 // Init name file (only first blcok for any board_id request)
778 firmwareDownloadChunck.file_name = clCanard.slave[queueId].file_server.get_file_name();
779 TRACE_INFO_F(F("File server: Starting upload file from local SD Card to remote module CAN [ %s ]\r\n"), firmwareDownloadChunck.file_name);
780 }
781 // Switch state of queue download file from sd card
782 // Method Reading with block request, disable read_next block in request
783 firmwareDownloadChunck.block_read_next = false;
784 firmwareDownloadChunck.block_id = req.offset / FILE_GET_DATA_BLOCK_SIZE;
785 firmwareDownloadChunck.board_id = queueId; // Set BOARDS Require File (Need for multiserver file request)
786 // Pushing data request to queue task sd card
787 localDataFileGetRequestQueue->Enqueue(&firmwareDownloadChunck);
788 // Waiting response from SD with TimeOUT
789 memset(&sdcard_task_response, 0, sizeof(file_get_response_t));
790 LocalTaskWatchDog(FILE_IO_DATA_QUEUE_TIMEOUT);
791 file_download_error = !localDataFileGetResponseQueue->Dequeue(&sdcard_task_response, FILE_IO_DATA_QUEUE_TIMEOUT);
792 file_download_error |= !sdcard_task_response.done_operation;
793 }
794
795 // Block data is avaiable? -> Send to remote node
796 if(file_download_error) {
797 // any error? (optional retry... from remote node. File server wait another request)
798 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("File server: Download data file from queue error!!!\r\n"));
799 resp._error.value = uavcan_file_Error_1_0_IO_ERROR;
800 dataLen = 0;
801 } else {
802 // Send block
803 if(sdcard_task_response.block_lenght!=FILE_GET_DATA_BLOCK_SIZE) {
804 // EOF Last Block (bytes read != FILE_GET_DATA_BLOCK_SIZE)
805 // No other response/request are to get
806 TRACE_INFO_F(F("File server: End of data block data, readed [ %lu ] bytes\r\n"), ((uint32_t)(firmwareDownloadChunck.block_id) * (uint32_t)(FILE_GET_DATA_BLOCK_SIZE)) + sdcard_task_response.block_lenght);
807 } else {
808 // Normal block, prepare for next block
809 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("File server: Readed data block id: [ %d ]\r\n"), firmwareDownloadChunck.block_id);
810 }
811 }
812 // *********** END GET Data File (Firmware) from SD CARD Queue ************
813 // Preparo la risposta corretta
814 resp.data.value.count = (size_t)sdcard_task_response.block_lenght;
815 memcpy(resp.data.value.elements, sdcard_task_response.block, resp.data.value.count);
816 uint8_t serialized[uavcan_file_Read_Response_1_1_SERIALIZATION_BUFFER_SIZE_BYTES_] = {0};
817 size_t serialized_size = sizeof(serialized);
818 if (uavcan_file_Read_Response_1_1_serialize_(&resp, &serialized[0], &serialized_size) >= 0) {
819 clCanard.slave[queueId].file_server.reset_pending(resp.data.value.count);
820 clCanard.sendResponse(CANARD_READFILE_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC, &transfer->metadata, serialized_size, &serialized[0]);
821 }
822 }
823 }
824 }
825 else
826 {
827 // Gestione di una richiesta senza controllore locale. Se arrivo quà è un errore di sviluppo
828 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
829 }
830 }
831 // Gestione delle risposte alle richeste inviate alla rete come Master
832 else if (transfer->metadata.transfer_kind == CanardTransferKindResponse)
833 {
834 // Comando inviato ad un nodo remoto, verifica della risposta e della coerenza messaggio
835 if (transfer->metadata.port_id == uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_1_1_FIXED_PORT_ID_)
836 {
837 uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Response_1_1 resp = {0};
838 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
839 if (uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Response_1_1_deserialize_(&resp, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
840 {
841 // Ricerco idNodo nella coda degli allocati del master
842 // Copio la risposta ricevuta nella struttura relativa e resetto il flag pending
843 uint8_t queueId = clCanard.getSlaveIstanceFromId(transfer->metadata.remote_node_id);
844 if (queueId != GENERIC_BVAL_UNDEFINED) {
845 // Resetta il pending del comando del nodo verificato
846 clCanard.slave[queueId].command.reset_pending(resp.status);
847 }
848 }
849 }
850 else if (transfer->metadata.port_id == uavcan_register_Access_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_)
851 {
852 uavcan_register_Access_Response_1_0 resp = {0};
853 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
854 if (uavcan_register_Access_Response_1_0_deserialize_(&resp, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
855 {
856 // Ricerco idNodo nella coda degli allocati del master
857 // Copio la risposta ricevuta nella struttura relativa e resetto il flag pending
858 uint8_t queueId = clCanard.getSlaveIstanceFromId(transfer->metadata.remote_node_id);
859 if (queueId != GENERIC_BVAL_UNDEFINED) {
860 // Resetta il pending del comando del nodo verificato con la risposta
861 clCanard.slave[queueId].register_access.reset_pending(resp.value);
862 }
863 }
864 }
865 else if (transfer->metadata.port_id == uavcan_file_Read_1_1_FIXED_PORT_ID_)
866 {
867 // Accetto solo messaggi indirizzati dal node_id che ha fatto la richiesta di upload
868 // E' una sicurezza per il controllo dell'upload, ed evità errori di interprete
869 // Inoltre non accetta messaggi extra standard UAVCAN, necessarià prima la CALL al comando
870 // SEtFirmwareUpload o SetFileUpload, che impostano il node_id, resettato su EOF dalla classe
871 if (clCanard.master.file.get_server_node() == transfer->metadata.remote_node_id) {
872 uavcan_file_Read_Response_1_1 resp = {0};
873 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
874 if (uavcan_file_Read_Response_1_1_deserialize_(&resp, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0) {
875 if(clCanard.master.file.is_firmware()) {
876 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("RX FIRMWARE READ BLOCK LEN: "));
877 // Segalo a LCD aggiornamento fw to flash in corso da CAN BUS
878 localSystemStatusLock->Take();
879 localSystemStatus->flags.fw_updating = true;
880 localSystemStatusLock->Give();
881 } else {
882 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("RX FILE READ BLOCK LEN: "));
883 }
884 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("%d\r\n"), resp.data.value.count);
885 // Save Data in Flash File at Block Position (Init = Rewrite file...)
886 if(putFlashFile(clCanard.master.file.get_name(), clCanard.master.file.is_firmware(), clCanard.master.file.is_first_data_block(),
887 resp.data.value.elements, resp.data.value.count)) {
888 // Reset pending command (Comunico request/Response Serie di comandi OK!!!)
889 // Uso l'Overload con controllo di EOF (-> EOF se msgLen != UAVCAN_BLOCK_DEFAULT [256 Bytes])
890 // Questo Overload gestisce in automatico l'offset del messaggio, per i successivi blocchi
891 clCanard.master.file.reset_pending(resp.data.value.count);
892 } else {
893 // Error Save... Abort request
894 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("SAVING BLOCK FILE ERROR, ABORT RX !!!\r\n"));
895 clCanard.master.file.download_end();
896 }
897 }
898 } else {
899 // Errore Nodo non settato...
900 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("RX FILE READ BLOCK REJECT: Node_Id not valid or not set\r\n"));
901 }
902 }
903 // Risposta ad un servizio (dati) dinamicamente allocato... ( deve essere ultimo else )
904 // Servizio di risposta alla richiesta su modulo slave, verifica della risposta e della coerenza messaggio
905 // Per il nodo che risponde verifico i servizi attivi per la corrispondenza dinamica risposta
906 else
907 {
908 // Nodo rispondente (posso avere senza problemi più servizi con stesso port_id su diversi nodi)
909 uint8_t queueId = clCanard.getSlaveIstanceFromId(transfer->metadata.remote_node_id);
910 // Se nodo correttammente allocato e gestito
911 if (queueId != GENERIC_BVAL_UNDEFINED) {
912 // Verifico se risposta del servizio corrisponde al chiamante (eventuali + servizi sotto...)
913 // Gestione di tutti i servizi possibili allocabili, valido per tutti i nodi
914 if (transfer->metadata.port_id == clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_port_id())
915 {
916 // Utilizzo un buffer di allocazione per RX Messaggio in Casting da postare sul meteodo Slave Canard
917 uint8_t castLocalBuffer[RMAP_DATA_MAX_ELEMENT_SIZE];
918 memset(castLocalBuffer, 0, sizeof(castLocalBuffer));
919 // Resetta il pending del comando del nodo verificato (size_mem preparato in avvio)
920 // Copia la risposta nella variabile di chiamata in state
921 // N.B. possibile gestire qua tutte le occorrenze per stima V4
922 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::th) {
923 rmap_service_module_TH_Response_1_0 *respCastTH = (rmap_service_module_TH_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
924 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
925 if (rmap_service_module_TH_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastTH, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
926 {
927 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastTH, sizeof(*respCastTH));
928 }
929 }
930 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::rain) {
931 rmap_service_module_Rain_Response_1_0 *respCastRain = (rmap_service_module_Rain_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
932 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
933 if (rmap_service_module_Rain_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastRain, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
934 {
935 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastRain, sizeof(*respCastRain));
936 }
937 }
938 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::wind) {
939 rmap_service_module_Wind_Response_1_0 *respCastWind = (rmap_service_module_Wind_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
940 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
941 if (rmap_service_module_Wind_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastWind, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
942 {
943 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastWind, sizeof(*respCastWind));
944 }
945 }
946 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::radiation) {
947 rmap_service_module_Radiation_Response_1_0 *respCastRadiation = (rmap_service_module_Radiation_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
948 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
949 if (rmap_service_module_Radiation_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastRadiation, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
950 {
951 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastRadiation, sizeof(*respCastRadiation));
952 }
953 }
954 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::vwc) {
955 rmap_service_module_VWC_Response_1_0 *respCastVWC = (rmap_service_module_VWC_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
956 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
957 if (rmap_service_module_VWC_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastVWC, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
958 {
959 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastVWC, sizeof(*respCastVWC));
960 }
961 }
962 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::power) {
963 rmap_service_module_Power_Response_1_0 *respCastPower = (rmap_service_module_Power_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
964 size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
965 if (rmap_service_module_Power_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastPower, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
966 {
967 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastPower, sizeof(*respCastPower));
968 }
969 }
970 }
971 }
972 }
973 }
974 else
975 {
976 // Se arrivo quà è un errore di sviluppo, controllare setup sottoscrizioni, risposte e messaggi
977 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
978 }
979}

132 // Init if required (DeInit after if required PowerDown Module)
133 if(localFlash->BSP_QSPI_Init() != Flash::QSPI_OK) {

151 // Get Block Current into Flash
152 canFlashBlock = canFlashPtr / AT25SF641_BLOCK_SIZE;
153 // Erase First Block Block (Block OF 4KBytes)
154 TRACE_INFO_F(F("FLASH: Erase block: %d\r\n"), canFlashBlock);
155 if (localFlash->BSP_QSPI_Erase_Block(canFlashBlock)) {

161 memcpy(file_flash_name, file_name, strlen(file_name));
162 localFlash->BSP_QSPI_Write(file_flash_name, canFlashPtr, FLASH_FILE_SIZE_LEN);
163 // Write into Flash
164 TRACE_INFO_F(F("FLASH: Write [ %d ] bytes at addr: %d\r\n"), FLASH_FILE_SIZE_LEN, canFlashPtr);

170 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("FLASH: Reading check ERROR\r\n"));

172 return false;
173 }
174 #endif
175 // Start Page...
176 canFlashPtr += FLASH_INFO_SIZE_LEN;
177 localQspiLock->Give();
178 }

181 // Qspi Security Semaphore
182 if(localQspiLock->Take(Ticks::MsToTicks(FLASH_SEMAPHORE_MAX_WAITING_TIME_MS))) {
183 // 0 = Is UavCan Signal EOF for Last Block Exact Len 256 Bytes...
184 // If Value Count is 0 no need to Write Flash Data (Only close Fule Info)
185 if(count!=0) {
186 // Write into Flash
187 TRACE_INFO_F(F("FLASH: Write [ %d ] bytes at addr: %d\r\n"), count, canFlashPtr);
188 // Starting Write at OFFSET Required... Erase here is Done
189 localFlash->BSP_QSPI_Write((uint8_t*)buf, canFlashPtr, count);
190 #ifdef CHECK_FLASH_WRITE
191 localFlash->BSP_QSPI_Read(check_data, canFlashPtr, count);
192 if(memcmp(buf, check_data, count)==0) {
193 TRACE_INFO_F(F("FLASH: Reading check OK\r\n"));
194 } else {
195 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("FLASH: Reading check ERROR\r\n"));
196 localQspiLock->Give();
197 return false;
198 }
199 #endif
200 canFlashPtr += count;
201 // Check if Next Page Addressed (For Erase Next Block)
202 if((canFlashPtr / AT25SF641_BLOCK_SIZE) != canFlashBlock) {
203 canFlashBlock = canFlashPtr / AT25SF641_BLOCK_SIZE;
204 // Erase First Block Block (Block OF 4KBytes)
205 TRACE_INFO_F(F("FLASH: Erase block: %d\r\n"), canFlashBlock);
206 if (localFlash->BSP_QSPI_Erase_Block(canFlashBlock)) {
207 localQspiLock->Give();
208 return false;
209 }
210 }
211 }
212 // Eof if != 256 Bytes Write
213 if(count!=0x100) {
214 // Write Info File for Closing...
215 // Size at
216 uint64_t lenghtFile = canFlashPtr - FLASH_INFO_SIZE_LEN;
217 if (is_firmware) {
218 // Firmware Flash
219 canFlashPtr = FLASH_FW_POSITION;
220 } else {
221 // Standard File Data Upload
222 canFlashPtr = FLASH_FILE_POSITION;
223 }
224 localFlash->BSP_QSPI_Write((uint8_t*)&lenghtFile, FLASH_SIZE_ADDR(canFlashPtr), FLASH_INFO_SIZE_U64);
225 // Write into Flash
226 TRACE_INFO_F(F("FLASH: Write [ %d ] bytes at addr: %d\r\n"), FLASH_INFO_SIZE_U64, canFlashPtr);
227 #ifdef CHECK_FLASH_WRITE
228 localFlash->BSP_QSPI_Read(check_data, FLASH_SIZE_ADDR(canFlashPtr), FLASH_INFO_SIZE_U64);

230 TRACE_INFO_F(F("FLASH: Reading check OK\r\n"));
231 } else {
232 TRACE_INFO_F(F("FLASH: Reading check ERROR\r\n"));
233 }
234 #endif
235 }
236 localQspiLock->Give();
237 }
238 return true;
239}

1425 getStimaDescriptionByType(description_board, param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].module_type);
1426 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Configure module slave: [ %s ], Address: %u, Port Id: %u, Publish Id: %u\r\n"),
1427 description_board, param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_address,
1428 param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_port_id, param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_publish_id);
1429 // Configure istance in a class
1430 clCanard.slave[iCnt].configure(
1431 param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_address,
1432 param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].module_type,
1433 param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_port_id,
1434 param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_publish_id,
1435 param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].serial_number);
1436 }
1437 #else
1438 // Configure istance in a class
1439 clCanard.slave[iCnt].configure(
1440 param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_address,
1441 param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].module_type,
1442 param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_port_id);
1443 param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].serial_number);
1444 #endif
1445 }
1446
1447 // Passa alle sottoscrizioni
1448 state = CAN_STATE_SETUP;
1449 break;
1450
1451 // ********************************************************************************
1452 // AVVIA SOTTOSCRIZIONI ai messaggi per servizi RPC ecc...
1453 // ********************************************************************************
1454 case CAN_STATE_SETUP:
1455
1456 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Can task: STARTING UAVCAV Subscrition and Service\r\n"));
1457
1458 // Service servers: -> Risposta per GetNodeInfo richiesta esterna (Yakut, Altri)
1459 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindRequest,
1460 uavcan_node_GetInfo_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_,
1461 uavcan_node_GetInfo_Request_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1462 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1463 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1464 }
1465
1466 // Service servers: -> Chiamata per ExecuteCommand richiesta esterna (Yakut, Altri)
1467 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindRequest,
1468 uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_1_1_FIXED_PORT_ID_,
1469 uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Request_1_1_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1470 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1471 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1472 }
1473
1474 // Service servers: -> Risposta per Accesso ai registri richiesta esterna (Yakut, Altri)
1475 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindRequest,
1476 uavcan_register_Access_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_,
1477 uavcan_register_Access_Request_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1478 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1479 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1480 }
1481
1482 // Service servers: -> Risposta per Lista dei registri richiesta esterna (Yakut, Altri)
1483 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindRequest,
1484 uavcan_register_List_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_,
1485 uavcan_register_List_Request_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1486 CANARD_REGISTERLIST_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1487 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1488 }

1491

1493 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindMessage,
1494 uavcan_pnp_NodeIDAllocationData_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_,
1495 uavcan_pnp_NodeIDAllocationData_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1496 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1497 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1498 }

1500 // Messaggi HEARTBEAT: -> Verifica della presenza per stato Nodi (Slave) OnLine / OffLine
1501 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindMessage,
1502 uavcan_node_Heartbeat_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_,
1503 uavcan_node_Heartbeat_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1504 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1505 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1506 }

1509 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindResponse,
1510 uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_1_1_FIXED_PORT_ID_,
1511 uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Response_1_1_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1512 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1513 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1514 }
1515

1517 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindResponse,
1518 uavcan_register_Access_1_0_FIXED_PORT_ID_,
1519 uavcan_register_Access_Response_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1520 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1521 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1522 }

1525 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindResponse,
1526 uavcan_file_Read_1_1_FIXED_PORT_ID_,
1527 uavcan_file_Read_Response_1_1_EXTENT_BYTES_,

1529 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1530 }

1532 // Service server: -> Risposta per Read (Request Slave) File read archivio (come master)
1533 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindRequest,
1534 uavcan_file_Read_1_1_FIXED_PORT_ID_,
1535 uavcan_file_Read_Request_1_1_EXTENT_BYTES_,

1540 // Allocazione dinamica delle subscription servizi request/response e pubblicazioni dei nodi remoti
1541 // in funzione delle registrazioni/istanze utilizzate nel master
1542 // Ogni subject utuilizzato per ogni nodo slave deve avere una sottoscrizione propria
1543 // Solo una sottoscrizione è possibile per singolo servizio per relativo port_id (dynamic o fixed)
1544 // La gestione di servizi con stesso port_id è assolutamente possibile e correttamente gestita
1545 // nel software. Basta solamente a livello server registrare lo stesso port_id per servizio.
1546 // La funzionailtà cosi impostata consente uno o più port_id x servizio senza problemi
1547 // Eventuali errori di allocazione possono eventualmente essere rilevati ma non ci sono problemi
1548 // sw in quanto una sottoscrizione chiamata in coda elimina una precedente (con stesso port o subjcect)
1549 for(byte queueId=0; queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; queueId++) {
1550 // ************* SERVICE *************
1551 // Se previsto il servizio request/response (!=NULL, quindi allocato) con port_id valido
1552 if ((clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_response()) &&
1553 (clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_port_id() <= CANARD_SERVICE_ID_MAX)) {

1557 // Service client: -> Risposta per ServiceDataModuleTH richiesta interna (come master)
1558 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindResponse,
1559 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_port_id(),
1560 rmap_service_module_TH_Response_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1561 CANARD_RMAPDATA_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1562 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1563 }
1564 }
1565 // Controllo le varie tipologie di request/service per il nodo
1566 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::rain) {
1567 // Alloco la stottoscrizione in funzione del tipo di modulo
1568 // Service client: -> Risposta per ServiceDataModuleTH richiesta interna (come master)
1569 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindResponse,
1570 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_port_id(),
1571 rmap_service_module_Rain_Response_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1572 CANARD_RMAPDATA_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1573 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1574 }
1575 }
1576 // Controllo le varie tipologie di request/service per il nodo
1577 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::wind) {
1578 // Alloco la stottoscrizione in funzione del tipo di modulo
1579 // Service client: -> Risposta per ServiceDataModuleTH richiesta interna (come master)
1580 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindResponse,
1581 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_port_id(),
1582 rmap_service_module_Wind_Response_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,

1588 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::radiation) {
1589 // Alloco la stottoscrizione in funzione del tipo di modulo

1592 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_port_id(),
1593 rmap_service_module_Radiation_Response_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1594 CANARD_RMAPDATA_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1595 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1596 }
1597 }
1598 // Controllo le varie tipologie di request/service per il nodo
1599 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::vwc) {
1600 // Alloco la stottoscrizione in funzione del tipo di modulo
1601 // Service client: -> Risposta per ServiceDataModuleTH richiesta interna (come master)
1602 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindResponse,
1603 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_port_id(),
1604 rmap_service_module_VWC_Response_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1605 CANARD_RMAPDATA_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1606 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1607 }
1608 }
1609 // Controllo le varie tipologie di request/service per il nodo
1610 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::power) {
1611 // Alloco la stottoscrizione in funzione del tipo di modulo
1612 // Service client: -> Risposta per ServiceDataModuleTH richiesta interna (come master)
1613 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindResponse,
1614 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_port_id(),
1615 rmap_service_module_Power_Response_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1616 CANARD_RMAPDATA_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1617 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1618 }
1619 }
1620 }
1621 #if defined(USE_SUB_PUBLISH_SLAVE_DATA) && defined(SUBSCRIBE_PUBLISH_SLAVE_DATA)
1622 // ************* PUBLISH *************
1623 // Se previsto il servizio publisher (subject_id valido)
1624 // Non alloco niente per il publish (gestione esempio display o altro debug interno da gestire)
1625 if (clCanard.slave[queueId].publisher.get_subject_id() <= CANARD_SUBJECT_ID_MAX) {
1626 // Controllo le varie tipologie di request/service per il nodo
1627 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::th) {
1628 // Alloco la stottoscrizione in funzione del tipo di modulo
1629 // Service client: -> Sottoscrizione per ModuleTH (come master)
1630 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindMessage,
1631 clCanard.slave[queueId].publisher.get_subject_id(),
1632 rmap_module_TH_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1633 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1634 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1635 }
1636 }
1637 // Controllo le varie tipologie di request/service per il nodo
1638 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::rain) {
1639 // Alloco la stottoscrizione in funzione del tipo di modulo
1640 // Service client: -> Sottoscrizione per ModuleTH (come master)
1641 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindMessage,
1642 clCanard.slave[queueId].publisher.get_subject_id(),
1643 rmap_module_Rain_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1644 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1645 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1646 }
1647 }
1648 // Controllo le varie tipologie di request/service per il nodo
1649 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::wind) {
1650 // Alloco la stottoscrizione in funzione del tipo di modulo
1651 // Service client: -> Sottoscrizione per ModuleTH (come master)
1652 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindMessage,
1653 clCanard.slave[queueId].publisher.get_subject_id(),
1654 rmap_module_Wind_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1655 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1656 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1657 }
1658 }
1659 // Controllo le varie tipologie di request/service per il nodo
1660 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::radiation) {
1661 // Alloco la stottoscrizione in funzione del tipo di modulo
1662 // Service client: -> Sottoscrizione per ModuleTH (come master)
1663 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindMessage,
1664 clCanard.slave[queueId].publisher.get_subject_id(),
1665 rmap_module_Radiation_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1666 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1667 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1668 }
1669 }
1670 // Controllo le varie tipologie di request/service per il nodo
1671 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::vwc) {
1672 // Alloco la stottoscrizione in funzione del tipo di modulo
1673 // Service client: -> Sottoscrizione per ModuleTH (come master)
1674 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindMessage,
1675 clCanard.slave[queueId].publisher.get_subject_id(),
1676 rmap_module_VWC_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1677 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1678 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1679 }
1680 }
1681 // Controllo le varie tipologie di request/service per il nodo
1682 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::power) {
1683 // Alloco la stottoscrizione in funzione del tipo di modulo
1684 // Service client: -> Sottoscrizione per ModuleTH (come master)
1685 if (!clCanard.rxSubscribe(CanardTransferKindMessage,
1686 clCanard.slave[queueId].publisher.get_subject_id(),
1687 rmap_module_Power_1_0_EXTENT_BYTES_,
1688 CANARD_DEFAULT_TRANSFER_ID_TIMEOUT_USEC)) {
1689 LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
1690 }
1691 }
1692 }
1693 #endif
1694 }
1695
1696 // Avvio il modulo UAVCAN in modalità operazionale normale
1697 // Eventuale SET Flag dopo acquisizione di configurazioni e/o parametri da Remoto
1698 clCanard.flag.set_local_node_mode(uavcan_node_Mode_1_0_OPERATIONAL);
1699
1700 // Set START Timetable LOOP RX/TX. Set Canard microsecond start, per le sincronizzazioni
1701 clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.start_syncronization);
1702 last_pub_heartbeat = clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.syncronized_time) + MEGA * (TIME_PUBLISH_HEARTBEAT + random(100) / 100);
1703 next_timesyncro_msg = clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.syncronized_time) + MEGA;
1704 last_pub_port_list = last_pub_heartbeat + MEGA * (0.5);
1705
1706 // Passo alla gestione Main
1707 state = CAN_STATE_CHECK;
1708 break;
1709
1710 // ********************************************************************************
1711 // AVVIA LOOP CANARD PRINCIPALE gestione TX/RX Code -> Messaggi
1712 // ********************************************************************************
1713 case CAN_STATE_CHECK:
1714
1715 // Set Canard microsecond corrente monotonic, per le attività temporanee di ciclo
1716 clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.start_syncronization);
1717
1718 // ************************************************************************
1719 // *************** CHECK OFFLINE/DEADLINE COMMAND/STATE ***************
1720 // ************************************************************************
1721
1722 // **********************************************************
1723 // Per la coda/istanze allocate valide SLAVE remote_node_flag
1724 // **********************************************************
1725 for (byte queueId = 0; queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; queueId++) {
1726 if (clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id() <= CANARD_NODE_ID_MAX) {
1727 // Check eventuale Nodo OFFLINE (Ultimo comando sempre perchè posso)
1728 // Effettuare eventuali operazioni di SET,RESET Cmd in sicurezza
1729 if (clCanard.slave[queueId].is_entered_offline()) {
1730 // Entro in OffLine
1731 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Nodo OFFLINE !!! Alert -> : %d\r\n"), clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id());
1732 // Metto i Flag in sicurezza, laddove dove non eventualmente gestito
1733 // Eventuali altre operazioni quà su Reset Comandi
1734 clCanard.slave[queueId].command.reset_pending();
1735 clCanard.slave[queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
1736 clCanard.slave[queueId].file_server.reset_pending();
1737 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending();
1738 // Set system_status (Set Node Offline)
1739 // Set module_version to unknown version to force get reload version and revision
1740 // If new firmware are updated (local or remote command) node go to offline mode...
1741 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1742 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].is_online = false;
1743 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version = 0;
1744 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision = 0;
1745 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
1746 }
1747 }
1748 }
1749
1750
1751 // **************************************************************************
1752 // *********************** FILE UPLOAD PROCESS HANDLER **********************
1753 // **************************************************************************
1754 // Verifica file download in corso (entro se in download)
1755 // Attivato da ricezione comando appropriato rxFile o rxFirmware
1756 if(clCanard.master.file.download_request()) {
1757 if(clCanard.master.file.is_firmware())
1758 // Set Flag locale per comunicazione HeartBeat... uploading OK in corso
1759 // Utilizzo locale per blocco procedure, sleep ecc. x Uploading
1760 clCanard.flag.set_local_fw_uploading(true);
1761 // Controllo eventuale timeOut del comando o RxBlocco e gestisco le Retry
1762 // Verifica TimeOUT Occurs per File download
1763 if(clCanard.master.file.event_timeout()) {
1764 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Time OUT File... event occurs\r\n"));
1765 // Gestione Retry previste dal comando per poi abbandonare
1766 uint8_t retry; // In overload x LOGGING
1767 if(clCanard.master.file.next_retry(&retry)) {
1768 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Next Retry File read: %u\r\n"), retry);
1769 } else {
1770 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("MAX Retry File occurs, download file ABORT !!!\r\n"));
1771 clCanard.master.file.download_end();
1772 }
1773 }
1774 // Se messaggio in pending non faccio niente è attendo la fine del comando in run
1775 // In caso di errore subentrerà il TimeOut e verrà essere gestita la retry
1776 if(!clCanard.master.file.is_pending()) {
1777 // Fine pending, con messaggio OK. Verifico se EOF o necessario altro blocco
1778 if(clCanard.master.file.is_download_complete()) {
1779 if(clCanard.master.file.is_firmware()) {
1780 TRACE_INFO_F(F("RX FIRMWARE COMPLETED !!!\r\n"));
1781 } else {
1782 TRACE_INFO_F(F("RX FILE COMPLETED !!!\r\n"));
1783 }
1784 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("File name: %s\r\n"), clCanard.master.file.get_name());
1785 // GetInfo && Verify Start Updating...
1786 if(clCanard.master.file.is_firmware()) {
1787 // Module type also checked before startin firmware_upgrade
1788 uint8_t module_type;
1789 uint8_t version;
1790 uint8_t revision;
1791 uint64_t fwFileLen = 0;
1792 getFlashFwInfoFile(&module_type, &version, &revision, &fwFileLen);
1793 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Firmware V%d.%d, Size: %lu bytes is ready for flash updating\r\n"),version, revision, (uint32_t) fwFileLen);
1794 }
1795 // Nessun altro evento necessario, chiudo File e stati
1796 // procedo all'aggiornamento Firmware dopo le verifiche di conformità
1797 // Ovviamente se si tratta di un file firmware
1798 clCanard.master.file.download_end();
1799 // Comunico a HeartBeat (Yakut o Altri) l'avvio dell'aggiornamento (se il file è un firmware...)
1800 // Per Yakut Pubblicare un HeartBeat prima dell'Avvio quindi con il flag
1801 // clCanard.local_node.file.updating_run = true >> HeartBeat Comunica Upgrade...
1802 if(clCanard.master.file.is_firmware()) {
1803 clCanard.flag.set_local_node_mode(uavcan_node_Mode_1_0_SOFTWARE_UPDATE);
1804 start_firmware_upgrade = true;
1805 // Preparo la struttua per informare il Boot Loader
1806 param.boot_request->app_executed_ok = false;
1807 param.boot_request->backup_executed = false;
1808 param.boot_request->app_forcing_start = false;
1809 param.boot_request->rollback_executed = false;
1810 param.boot_request->request_upload = true;
1811 param.eeprom->Write(BOOT_LOADER_STRUCT_ADDR, (uint8_t*) param.boot_request, sizeof(bootloader_t));
1812 }
1813 // Il Firmware Upload dovrà partire necessariamente almeno dopo l'invio completo
1814 // di HeartBeat (svuotamento coda), quindi via subito in heart_beat send
1815 // Counque non rispondo più ai comandi di update con file.updating_run = true
1816 } else {
1817 // Avvio prima request o nuovo blocco (Set Flag e TimeOut)
1818 // Prima request (clCanard.local_node.file.offset == 0)
1819 // Firmmware Posizione blocco gestito automaticamente in sequenza Request/Read
1820 // Gestione retry (incremento su TimeOut/Error) Automatico in Init/Request-Response
1821 // Esco se raggiunga un massimo numero di retry x Frame... sopra
1822 // Get Data Block per popolare il File
1823 // Se il Buffer è pieno = 256 Caratteri è necessario continuare
1824 // Altrimenti se inferiore o (0 Compreso) il trasferimento file termina.
1825 // Se = 0 il blocco finale non viene considerato ma serve per il protocollo
1826 // Se l'ultimo buffer dovesse essere pieno discrimina l'eventualità di MaxBuf==Eof
1827 clCanard.master_file_read_block_pending(NODE_GETFILE_TIMEOUT_US);
1828 }
1829 }
1830 }
1831
1832 // ***********************************************************************
1833 // ********** GET SYNCRO ACTIVITY FOR CYPAL RMAP DATA FUNCTION *********
1834 // ***********************************************************************
1835 // Test if data are to acquire (one time for second)
1836 if(clCanard.getUpTimeSecond()!=getUpTimeSecondCurr)
1837 {
1838 // Update check next acquire test
1839 getUpTimeSecondCurr = clCanard.getUpTimeSecond();
1840 if (param.rtcLock->Take(Ticks::MsToTicks(RTC_WAIT_DELAY_MS))) {
1841 curEpoch = rtc.getEpoch();
1842 param.rtcLock->Give();
1843 }
1844 // need do acquire istant value for display?
1845 // N.B. param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_istant automatic resetted when node entering onLine from offLine
1846 // Read data only if Display or other Task need to show/get this value
1847 if((param.system_status->flags.display_on)||(bStartupGetIstant)) {
1848 if ((curEpoch / CONFIGURATION_DEFAULT_UPDATE_IST_S) != param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_istant) {
1849 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1850 param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_istant = curEpoch / CONFIGURATION_DEFAULT_UPDATE_IST_S;
1851 param.system_status->datetime.epoch_sensors_get_istant = (curEpoch / CONFIGURATION_DEFAULT_UPDATE_IST_S) * CONFIGURATION_DEFAULT_UPDATE_IST_S;
1852 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
1853 bStartGetIstant = true;
1854 }
1855 }
1856 // need do acquire data value for RMAP Archive?
1857 // Perform an Full Power request Method SEC_WAKE_UP_MODULE_FOR_QUERY (5) second before Starting aquire data
1858 // In this time we can regulate syncro_time method and perform Full Wake UP of remote Module
1859 if (((curEpoch + SEC_WAKE_UP_MODULE_FOR_QUERY) / param.configuration->report_s) != param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_value) {
1860 // WakeUP Network for reading sensor and Synncronize date_time
1861 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Rmap data server: Start full power for sending request and syncronize time\r\n"));
1862 // Only for RMAP Get Data is need to Forced power ON on Starting time before procedure GET DATA
1863 // RMAP Get data dont' start with command request automatic but some second before (also syncro_time)
1864 // This is need to fix problem of request ON/OFF continuative for module and simulate waiting command...
1865 bStartSetFullPower = true;
1866 // Starting server get data (dont stop when bStartSetFullPower is setted. Only for Set Full POWER)
1867 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1868 param.system_status->flags.rmap_server_running = true;
1869 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
1870 } else {
1871 // Normal mode (Not WakeUP)
1872 bStartSetFullPower = false;
1873 }
1874 if ((curEpoch / param.configuration->report_s) != param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_value) {
1875 // WakeUP Network for reading sensor and Synncronize date_time
1876 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Rmap data server: Start acquire request to sensor network\r\n"));
1877 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1878 param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_value = curEpoch / param.configuration->report_s;
1879 param.system_status->datetime.epoch_sensors_get_value = (curEpoch / param.configuration->report_s) * param.configuration->report_s;
1880 // Calculate expected/recived HeartBeat sequence... and reset counter
1881 // Only At first data % can be < 100%, depending of acquire time but isn't a real error
1882 for(uint8_t iSlave = 0; iSlave < BOARDS_COUNT_MAX; iSlave++) {
1883 // Calculate % from correct Heartbeat sequence TX-RX Transaction Completed (if one is executed)
1884 if(param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx > MIN_VALID_HEARTBEAT_RX) {
1885 if(param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx > MIN_TRANSACTION_HEARTBEAT_RX) {
1886 param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].perc_can_comm_err = (uint8_t)((float)(param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx_err - MIN_TRANSACTION_HEARTBEAT_RX) / (float)(param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx) * 100.0);
1887 } else {
1888 param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].perc_can_comm_err = 0;
1889 }
1890 } else {
1891 param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].perc_can_comm_err = 100;
1892 }
1893 // Reset Next Counter for next acquire data
1894 param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx = 0;
1895 param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx_err = 0;
1896 }
1897 // Require new connection at time (report time is passed)
1898 param.system_status->flags.new_start_connect = true;
1899 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
1900 bStartGetData = true;
1901 }
1902 }
1903 // ************* END GET SYNCRO ACTIVITY FOR CYPAL FUNCTION **************
1904
1905 // ***********************************************************************
1906 // ********************** RMAP GETDATA TX-> RX<- *************************
1907 // ***********************************************************************
1908
1909 // IS START COMMAND DATA RMAP AUTOMATIC REQUEST (From Local Syncro Activity UP...)?
1910 // Get Istant Data or Archive Data Request (Need to Display, Saving Data or other Function with Istant/Archive Data)
1911 if ((bStartGetIstant)||(bStartGetData)) {
1912 // For all node
1913 // bStartGetData are priority Command if both requested
1914 for(uint8_t queueId=0; queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; queueId++) {
1915 // For all node onLine
1916 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].is_online()) {
1917 // Command are sending without other Pending Command
1918 // Service request structure is same for all RMAP object to simplify function
1919 if(!clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.is_pending()) {
1920 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Inviato richiesta dati al nodo remoto: %d\r\n"), clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id());
1921 // parametri.canale = rmap_service_setmode_1_0_CH01 (es-> set CH Analogico...)
1922 // parametri.run_for_second = 900; ( not used for get_istant )
1923 rmap_service_setmode_1_0 paramRequest;
1924 paramRequest.chanel = 0; // Request only for chanel analog/digital adressed 1..X
1925 // higher priority guaranteed
1926 if(bStartGetData) {
1927 paramRequest.command = rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last;
1928 paramRequest.obs_sectime = param.configuration->observation_s;
1929 paramRequest.run_sectime = param.configuration->report_s;
1930 } else {
1931 paramRequest.command = rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_istant;
1932 paramRequest.obs_sectime = 0;
1933 paramRequest.run_sectime = 0;
1934 }
1935 // Imposta il pending del comando per verifica sequenza TX-RX e il TimeOut e in num retry.
1936 // La risposta al comando è già nel blocco dati, non necessaria ulteriore variabile
1937 clCanard.send_rmap_data_pending(queueId, NODE_GETDATA_TIMEOUT_US, paramRequest, NODE_GETDATA_MAX_RETRY);
1938 // Avvio il server RMAP Request
1939 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1940 param.system_status->flags.rmap_server_running = true;
1941 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
1942 }
1943 }
1944 }
1945 // Remove start command request when command are sent
1946 bStartGetIstant = false;
1947 bStartGetData = false;
1948 }
1949
1950 // EVENT GESTION OF TIMEOUT AT REQUEST
1951 if(param.system_status->flags.rmap_server_running) {
1952
1953 // Check if file server are current in running state
1954 bool rmapServerEnd = true;
1955 // Waiting WARM_UP (GetSyncroTime UP Procedure before end server)
1956 if(bStartSetFullPower) rmapServerEnd = false;
1957
1958 for(uint8_t queueId=0; queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; queueId++) {
1959 // Check if is request pending... (NONE... flag remaining true END Server)
1960 if (clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.is_pending()) {
1961 rmapServerEnd = false;
1962 }
1963 if (clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.event_timeout()) {
1964 // Next retry if is possible Stop and estart pending
1965 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending();
1966 if(!clCanard.send_rmap_data_pending_retry(queueId, NODE_GETDATA_TIMEOUT_US)) {
1967 // TimeOUT di un comando in attesa... end Retry
1968 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Timeout risposta su richiesta dati al nodo remoto: %d, Warning [restore pending command]\r\n"),
1969 clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id());
1970 } else {
1971 rmapServerEnd = false;
1972 // TimeOUT di un comando in attesa... gestione Retry
1973 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Timeout risposta su richiesta dati al nodo remoto: %d, Warning [retry command: %d]\r\n"),
1974 clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id(), clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.retry + 1);
1975 }
1976 }
1977 }
1978 // EVENT GESTION OF RECIVED DATA AT REQUEST
1979 for(uint8_t queueId=0; queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; queueId++) {
1980 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.is_executed()) {
1981 clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending();
1982 // Interprete del messaggio in casting dal puntatore dinamico
1983 // Nell'esempio Il modulo e TH, naturalmente bisogna gestire il tipo
1984 // in funzione di clCanard.slave[x].node_type
1985 switch (clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type()) {
1986 case Module_Type::th:
1987 // Cast to th module
1988 retTHData = (rmap_service_module_TH_Response_1_0*) clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_response();
1989 // data RMAP type is ready to send into queue Archive Data for Saving on SD Memory
1990 // Get parameter data
1991 #if TRACE_LEVEL >= TRACE_INFO
1992 getStimaNameByType(stimaName, clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type());
1993 #endif
1994 // Put data in system_status with module_type and RMAP Ver.Rev if not equal (reload or updated)
1995 if((param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version!=retTHData->version) ||
1996 (param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision!=retTHData->revision)) {
1997 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1998 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version = retTHData->version;
1999 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision = retTHData->revision;
2000 // Module type also setted on load config module CAN
2001 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();
2002 // Reset flag before recheck exixting firmware available
2003 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].fw_upgradable = false;
2004 // Check if module can be updated
2005 for(uint8_t checkId=0; checkId<STIMA_MODULE_TYPE_MAX_AVAIABLE; checkId++) {
2006 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].module_type) {
2007 if((param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].version > retTHData->version) ||
2008 ((param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].version == retTHData->version) &&
2009 (param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].revision > retTHData->revision))) {
2010 // Found an upgradable boards
2011 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].fw_upgradable = true;
2012 }
2013 break;
2014 }
2015 }
2016 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2017 }
2018 // TRACE Info data
2019 TRACE_INFO_F(F("RMAP recived response data module from [ %s ], node id: %d. Response code: %d\r\n"),
2020 stimaName, clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id(), retTHData->state);
2021 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Value (ITH) TP %d, UH: %d\r\n"), retTHData->ITH.temperature.val.value, retTHData->ITH.humidity.val.value);
2022 // Get security remote state on maintenance mode from 4.2 Version
2023 if((retTHData->version>4)||((retTHData->version==4)&&(retTHData->revision>=2))) {
2024 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].maintenance_mode = (retTHData->state & CAN_FLAG_IS_MAINTENANCE_MODE);
2025 }
2026 retTHData->state &= CAN_FLAG_MASK_MAINTENANCE_MODE;
2027 if(param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].maintenance_mode) {
2028 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Warning this module is in maintenance mode!!!\r\n"));
2029 }
2030 // Put istant data in system_status
2031 if(retTHData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_istant) {
2032 // Only istant request LCD or other device
2033 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2034 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].data_value[0] = retTHData->ITH.temperature.val.value;
2035 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].data_value[1] = retTHData->ITH.humidity.val.value;
2036 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].is_new_ist_data_ready = true;
2037 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2038 } else if(retTHData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last) {
2039 // data value id rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last into queue SD

2042 if(retTHData->is_main_error) bit8Flag|=0x01;
2043 if(retTHData->is_redundant_error) bit8Flag|=0x02;
2044 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2045 param.system_status->flags.new_data_to_send = true;
2046 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].bit8StateFlag = bit8Flag;
2047 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[0] = retTHData->rbt_event;
2048 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[1] = retTHData->wdt_event;
2049 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[2] = retTHData->perc_i2c_error;
2050 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2051 // Copy Data
2052 memset(&rmap_archive_data, 0, sizeof(rmap_archive_data_t));
2053 // Set Module Type, Date Time as Uint32 GetEpoch_Style, and Block Data Cast to RMAP Type
2054 rmap_archive_data.module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();
2055 rmap_archive_data.date_time = param.system_status->datetime.epoch_sensors_get_value;
2056 memcpy(rmap_archive_data.block, retTHData, sizeof(*retTHData));
2057 // Send queue to SD for direct archive data
2058 // Queue is dimensioned to accept all Data for one step pushing array data (MAX_BOARDS)
2059 // Clean queue if is full to send alwayl the last data on getted value
2060 if(param.dataRmapPutQueue->IsFull()) param.dataLogPutQueue->Dequeue(&rmap_archive_empty);
2061 param.dataRmapPutQueue->Enqueue(&rmap_archive_data, Ticks::MsToTicks(CAN_PUT_QUEUE_RMAP_TIMEOUT_MS));
2062 }
2063 break;

2066 // Cast to th module
2067 retRainData = (rmap_service_module_Rain_Response_1_0*) clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_response();

2070 #if TRACE_LEVEL >= TRACE_INFO
2071 getStimaNameByType(stimaName, clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type());

2124 if(retRainData->is_redundant_error) bit8Flag|=0x02;
2125 if(retRainData->is_tipping_error) bit8Flag|=0x04;

2243 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2244 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version = retRadiationData->version;
2245 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision = retRadiationData->revision;
2246 // Module type also setted on load config module CAN
2247 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();
2248 // Reset flag before recheck exixting firmware available
2249 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].fw_upgradable = false;
2250 // Check if module can be updated
2251 for(uint8_t checkId=0; checkId<STIMA_MODULE_TYPE_MAX_AVAIABLE; checkId++) {
2252 if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].module_type) {
2253 if((param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].version > retRadiationData->version) ||
2254 ((param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].version == retRadiationData->version) &&
2255 (param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].revision > retRadiationData->revision))) {
2256 // Found an upgradable boards
2257 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].fw_upgradable = true;
2258 }
2259 break;
2260 }
2261 }
2262 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2263 }
2264 // TRACE Info data
2265 TRACE_INFO_F(F("RMAP recived response data module from [ %s ], node id: %d. Response code: %d\r\n"),
2266 stimaName, clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id(), retRadiationData->state);
2267 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Value (DSA) Radiation %d\r\n"), retRadiationData->DSA.radiation.val.value);
2268 // Get security remote state on maintenance mode from 4.2 Version
2269 if((retRadiationData->version>4)||((retRadiationData->version==4)&&(retRadiationData->revision>=2))) {
2270 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].maintenance_mode = (retRadiationData->state & CAN_FLAG_IS_MAINTENANCE_MODE);
2271 }
2272 retRadiationData->state &= CAN_FLAG_MASK_MAINTENANCE_MODE;
2273 if(param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].maintenance_mode) {
2274 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Warning this module is in maintenance mode!!!\r\n"));
2275 }
2276 // Put istant data in system_status
2277 if(retRadiationData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_istant) {
2278 // Only istant request LCD or other device
2279 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2280 // Set data istant value (switch depends from request, istant = sample, Data = Avg.)
2281 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].data_value[0] = retRadiationData->DSA.radiation.val.value;
2282 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].is_new_ist_data_ready = true;
2283 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2284 } else if(retRadiationData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last) {
2285 // data value id rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last into queue SD
2286 // Copy Flag State
2287 bit8Flag = 0;
2288 if(retRadiationData->is_adc_unit_error) bit8Flag|=0x01;
2289 if(retRadiationData->is_adc_unit_overflow) bit8Flag|=0x02;
2290 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2291 param.system_status->flags.new_data_to_send = true;
2292 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].bit8StateFlag = bit8Flag;
2293 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[0] = retRadiationData->rbt_event;
2294 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[1] = retRadiationData->wdt_event;
2295 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[2] = 0;
2296 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2297 // Copy Data
2298 memset(&rmap_archive_data, 0, sizeof(rmap_archive_data_t));
2299 // Set Module Type, Date Time as Uint32 GetEpoch_Style, and Block Data Cast to RMAP Type
2300 rmap_archive_data.module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();
2301 rmap_archive_data.date_time = param.system_status->datetime.epoch_sensors_get_value;
2302 memcpy(rmap_archive_data.block, retRadiationData, sizeof(*retRadiationData));
2303 // Send queue to SD for direct archive data
2304 // Queue is dimensioned to accept all Data for one step pushing array data (MAX_BOARDS)
2305 // Clean queue if is full to send alwayl the last data on getted value
2306 if(param.dataRmapPutQueue->IsFull()) param.dataLogPutQueue->Dequeue(&rmap_archive_empty);
2307 param.dataRmapPutQueue->Enqueue(&rmap_archive_data, Ticks::MsToTicks(CAN_PUT_QUEUE_RMAP_TIMEOUT_MS));
2308 }
2309 break;
2310
2311 case Module_Type::power:
2312 // Cast to th module
2313 retPwrData = (rmap_service_module_Power_Response_1_0*) clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_response();
2314 // data RMAP type is ready to send into queue Archive Data for Saving on SD Memory
2315 // Get parameter data
2316 #if TRACE_LEVEL >= TRACE_INFO
2317 getStimaNameByType(stimaName, clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type());
2318 #endif
2319 // Put data in system_status with module_type and RMAP Ver.Rev if not equal (reload or updated)
2320 if((param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version!=retPwrData->version) ||
2321 (param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision!=retPwrData->revision)) {
2322 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2323 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version = retPwrData->version;
2324 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision = retPwrData->revision;
2325 // Module type also setted on load config module CAN
2326 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();

2342 }
2343 // TRACE Info data

2346 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Value (MPP) Batt Chg. %d, In V. %d, Batt Curr. %d\r\n"),
2347 retPwrData->MPP.battery_charge.val.value, retPwrData->MPP.input_voltage.val.value, retPwrData->MPP.battery_current.val.value);
2348 // Get security remote state on maintenance mode from 4.2 Version
2349 if((retPwrData->version>4)||((retPwrData->version==4)&&(retPwrData->revision>=2))) {

2351 }

2353 if(param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].maintenance_mode) {
2354 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Warning this module is in maintenance mode!!!\r\n"));
2355 }
2356 // Put istant data in system_status
2357 if(retPwrData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_istant) {

2361 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].data_value[1] = retPwrData->MPP.input_voltage.val.value;
2362 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].data_value[2] = retPwrData->MPP.battery_current.val.value;
2363 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].is_new_ist_data_ready = true;
2364 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2365 } else if(retPwrData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last) {
2366 // data value id rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last into queue SD
2367 // Copy Flag State ( Set only Warning Power to Send at Server RMAP )
2368 bit8Flag = 0;
2369 if(retPwrData->is_ltc_unit_error) bit8Flag|=0x0001;
2370 if(retPwrData->is_power_warning) bit8Flag|=0x0002;
2371 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2372 param.system_status->flags.new_data_to_send = true;
2373 // Copy critical and warning power flag (Use only critical for internal purpose)
2374 param.system_status->flags.power_warning = retPwrData->is_power_warning;
2375 param.system_status->flags.power_critical = retPwrData->is_power_critical;
2376 // Remove critical power flag if error measure occurs: prevent error sending data (disable modem when critical power)
2377 // This command don't remove flags sending to RMAP Server
2378 if((retPwrData->MPP.battery_charge.val.value == 0) || (retPwrData->MPP.battery_charge.val.value > rmap_tableb_B25192_1_0_MAX)) {
2379 param.system_status->flags.power_critical = false;
2380 }
2381 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].bit8StateFlag = bit8Flag;
2382 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[0] = retPwrData->rbt_event;
2383 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[1] = retPwrData->wdt_event;
2384 param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[2] = 0;
2385 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2386 // Copy Data
2387 memset(&rmap_archive_data, 0, sizeof(rmap_archive_data_t));
2388 // Set Module Type, Date Time as Uint32 GetEpoch_Style, and Block Data Cast to RMAP Type
2389 rmap_archive_data.module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();
2390 rmap_archive_data.date_time = param.system_status->datetime.epoch_sensors_get_value;
2391 memcpy(rmap_archive_data.block, retPwrData, sizeof(*retPwrData));
2392 // Send queue to SD for direct archive data
2393 // Queue is dimensioned to accept all Data for one step pushing array data (MAX_BOARDS)
2394 // Clean queue if is full to send alwayl the last data on getted value
2395 if(param.dataRmapPutQueue->IsFull()) param.dataLogPutQueue->Dequeue(&rmap_archive_empty);

2400 case Module_Type::vwc:

2436 // Get security remote state on maintenance mode from 4.2 Version

2459 if(retVwcData->is_adc_unit_overflow) bit8Flag|=0x02;
