2490 // STOP Server request data RMAP
2491 if (rmapServerEnd) {
2492 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2493 param.system_status->flags.rmap_server_running = false;
2494 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2495 }
2496 } else {
2497 // Security off pending status
2498 for(uint8_t rmap_server_queueId=0; rmap_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; rmap_server_queueId++) {
2499 clCanard.slave[rmap_server_queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending();
2500 }
2501 }
2502 // ********************* END RMAP GETDATA TX-> RX<- **********************
2503
2504 // ***********************************************************************
2505 // ************* REMOTE RPC UAVCAN REQUEST FUNCTION SERVER ***************
2506 // ***********************************************************************
2507 // Get coda comandi da system_message... se richiesto comando da LCD o RPC Remota
2508 // Da inoltrare al nodo selezionato in coda, parametro
2509 if(!param.systemMessageQueue->IsEmpty()) {
2510 // Message queue is for CAN (If FW Upgrade local Master, Message is for SD...)
2511 if(param.systemMessageQueue->Peek(&system_message, 0)) {
2512 // Only local task post message queue can be processed here
2513 // Messages checked here can only be addressed to remote slaves. So the addresses must be in the valid area
2514 if((system_message.task_dest == LOCAL_TASK_ID) && (system_message.node_id < MAX_NODE_CONNECT)) {
2515 // ***************************** Command *****************************
2516 // Procedure can continue only without other command in pending state
2517 // If command not starting, time_out remove the command and queue can be free from item
2518 if(!clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].command.is_pending()) {
2519 // ENTER MAINTENANCE
2520 if(system_message.command.do_maint) {
2521 // Start Flag Event Start when request configuration is request
2522 // When remote node recive VSC from Master Heartbeat Remote slave FullPower is performed
2523 // Then new state for slave (fullpower) are resend to master. If Ok procedure can start
2524 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on) {
2525 // Remove message from the queue
2526 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
2527 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Command server: Send request maintenance mode at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2528 // Request start module maintenance from LCD or Remote RPC with Param 0/1
2529 char do_maint = 1;
2530 clCanard.send_command_pending(system_message.node_id, NODE_COMMAND_TIMEOUT_US,
2531 canardClass::Command_Private::module_maintenance, &do_maint, sizeof(do_maint));
2532 // Starting message server
2533 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2534 param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running = true;
2535 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2536 message_traced = false;
2537 } else {
2538 // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for type of command
2539 if(!message_traced) {
2540 message_traced = true;
2541 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Command server: Start full power for sending command at node: [ %d ]"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2542 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2543 param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = true;
2544 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2545 }
2546 }
2547 }
2548 // UNDO MAINTENANCE
2549 if(system_message.command.undo_maint) {
2550 // Start Flag Event Start when request configuration is request
2551 // When remote node recive VSC from Master Heartbeat Remote slave FullPower is performed
2552 // Then new state for slave (fullpower) are resend to master. If Ok procedure can start
2553 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on) {
2554 // Remove message from the queue
2555 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
2556 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Command server: Send remove maintenance mode at Node: [ %d ]"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2557 // Request start module maintenance from LCD or Remote RPC with Param 0/1
2558 char undo_maint = 0;
2559 clCanard.send_command_pending(system_message.node_id, NODE_COMMAND_TIMEOUT_US,
2560 canardClass::Command_Private::module_maintenance, &undo_maint, sizeof(undo_maint));
2561 // Starting message server
2562 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2563 param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running = true;
2564 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2565 message_traced = false;
2566 } else {
2567 // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for type of command
2568 if(!message_traced) {
2569 message_traced = true;
2570 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Command server: Start full power for sending command at node: [ %d ]"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2571 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2572 param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = true;
2573 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2574 }
2575 }
2576 }
2577 // STARTING CALIBRATION (Accelerometer)
2578 if(system_message.command.do_calib_acc) {
2579 // Start Flag Event Start when request configuration is request
2580 // When remote node recive VSC from Master Heartbeat Remote slave FullPower is performed
2581 // Then new state for slave (fullpower) are resend to master. If Ok procedure can start
2582 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on) { // Remove message from the queue
2583 // Remove message from the queue
2584 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
2585 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Command server: Send request calibration accelerometer at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2586 // Requestcalibration accellerometer from LCD or Remote RPC without param
2587 clCanard.send_command_pending(system_message.node_id, NODE_COMMAND_TIMEOUT_US,
2588 canardClass::Command_Private::calibrate_accelerometer, NULL, 0);
2589 // Starting message server
2590 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2591 param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running = true;
2592 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2593 message_traced = false;
2594 } else {
2595 // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for type of command
2596 if(!message_traced) {
2597 message_traced = true;
2598 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Command server: Start full power for sending command at node: [ %d ]"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2599 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2600 param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = true;
2601 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2602 }
2603 }
2604 }
2605 // DO FACTORY (Remote register clear -> init register and node restart from PnP request...)
2606 if(system_message.command.do_factory) {
2607 // Start Flag Event Start when request configuration is request
2608 // When remote node recive VSC from Master Heartbeat Remote slave FullPower is performed
2609 // Then new state for slave (fullpower) are resend to master. If Ok procedure can start
2610 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on) { // Remove message from the queue
2611 // Remove message from the queue
2612 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
2613 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Command server: Send request calibration accelerometer at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2614 // Requestcalibration accellerometer from LCD or Remote RPC without param
2615 clCanard.send_command_pending(system_message.node_id, NODE_COMMAND_TIMEOUT_US,
2616 uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Request_1_1_COMMAND_FACTORY_RESET, NULL, 0);
2617 // Starting message server
2618 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2619 param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running = true;
2620 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2621 message_traced = false;
2622 } else {
2623 // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for type of command
2624 if(!message_traced) {
2625 message_traced = true;
2626 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Command server: Start full power for sending command at node: [ %d ]"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2627 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2628 param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = true;
2629 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2630 }
2631 }
2632 }
2633 // RESET FLAGS (All module slave)
2634 if(system_message.command.do_reset_flags) {
2635 // Start Flag Event Start when request configuration is request
2636 // When remote node recive VSC from Master Heartbeat Remote slave FullPower is performed
2637 // Then new state for slave (fullpower) are resend to master. If Ok procedure can start
2638 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on) {
2639 // Remove message from the queue
2640 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
2641 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Command server: Send request init flags at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2642 // Request calibration accellerometer from LCD or Remote RPC without param
2643 clCanard.send_command_pending(system_message.node_id, NODE_COMMAND_TIMEOUT_US,
2644 canardClass::Command_Private::reset_flags, NULL, 0);
2645 // Starting message server
2646 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2647 param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running = true;
2648 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2649 message_traced = false;
2650 } else {
2651 // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for type of command
2652 if(!message_traced) {
2653 message_traced = true;
2654 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Command server: Start full power for sending command at node: [ %d ]"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2655 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2656 param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = true;
2657 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2658 }
2659 }
2660 }
2661 // RESET FLAGS (All module slave)
2662 if(system_message.command.do_reboot_node) {
2663 // Start Flag Event Start when request configuration is request
2664 // When remote node recive VSC from Master Heartbeat Remote slave FullPower is performed
2665 // Then new state for slave (fullpower) are resend to master. If Ok procedure can start
2666 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on) {
2667 // Remove message from the queue
2668 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
2669 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Command server: Send direct reboot at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2670 // Direct reboot from LCD or Remote RPC without param
2671 clCanard.send_command(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id(), NODE_COMMAND_TIMEOUT_US,
2672 uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Request_1_1_COMMAND_RESTART, NULL, 0);
2673 // No required Starting message server on Reboot Command
2674 } else {
2675 // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for type of command
2676 if(!message_traced) {
2677 message_traced = true;
2678 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Command server: Start full power for sending command at node: [ %d ]"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2679 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2680 param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = true;
2681 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2682 }
2683 }
2684 }
2685 }
2686 // ************************* Register access *************************
2687 // Procedure can continue only without other register in pending state
2688 // If register not starting, time_out remove the set register and queue can be free from item
2689 if(!clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].register_access.is_pending()) {
2690 // REMOTE REGISTER Modify (All module slave)
2691 if(system_message.command.do_remote_reg) {
2692 // Start Flag Event Start when request configuration is request
2693 // When remote node recive VSC from Master Heartbeat Remote slave FullPower is performed
2694 // Then new state for slave (fullpower) are resend to master. If Ok procedure can start
2695 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on) {
2696 // Remove message from the queue
2697 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
2698 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: Send register modify at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2699 // Send register value (Set type from Uavcan Type register selection)
2700 // uavcan_register select and set value (default is empty)
2701 uavcan_register_Value_1_0 rpcRegisterValue = {0};
2702 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_empty_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2703 switch (system_message.param) {
2704 case RVS_TYPE_BIT:
2705 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_bit_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2706 rpcRegisterValue.bit.value.count = 1;
2707 rpcRegisterValue.bit.value.bitpacked[0] = system_message.value.bool_val;
2708 break;
2709 case RVS_TYPE_INTEGER_8:
2710 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_integer8_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2711 rpcRegisterValue.integer8.value.count = 1;
2712 rpcRegisterValue.integer8.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.int8_val;
2713 break;
2714 case RVS_TYPE_INTEGER_16:
2715 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_integer16_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2716 rpcRegisterValue.integer16.value.count = 1;
2717 rpcRegisterValue.integer16.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.int16_val;
2718 break;
2719 case RVS_TYPE_INTEGER_32:
2720 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_integer32_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2721 rpcRegisterValue.integer32.value.count = 1;
2722 rpcRegisterValue.integer32.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.int32_val;
2723 break;
2724 case RVS_TYPE_INTEGER_64:
2725 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_integer64_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2726 rpcRegisterValue.integer64.value.count = 1;
2727 rpcRegisterValue.integer64.value.elements[0] = (int64_t)system_message.value.int32_val;
2728 break;
2729 case RVS_TYPE_NATURAL_8:
2730 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_natural8_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2731 rpcRegisterValue.natural8.value.count = 1;
2732 rpcRegisterValue.natural8.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.uint8_val;
2733 break;
2734 case RVS_TYPE_NATURAL_16:
2735 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_natural16_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2736 rpcRegisterValue.natural16.value.count = 1;
2737 rpcRegisterValue.natural16.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.uint16_val;
2738 break;
2739 case RVS_TYPE_NATURAL_32:
2740 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_natural32_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2741 rpcRegisterValue.natural32.value.count = 1;
2742 rpcRegisterValue.natural32.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.uint32_val;
2743 break;
2744 case RVS_TYPE_NATURAL_64:
2745 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_natural64_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2746 rpcRegisterValue.natural64.value.count = 1;
2747 rpcRegisterValue.natural64.value.elements[0] = (uint64_t)system_message.value.uint32_val;
2748 break;
2749 case RVS_TYPE_REAL_16:
2750 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_real16_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2751 rpcRegisterValue.real16.value.count = 1;
2752 rpcRegisterValue.real16.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.float_val;
2753 break;
2754 case RVS_TYPE_REAL_32:
2755 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_real32_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2756 rpcRegisterValue.real32.value.count = 1;
2757 rpcRegisterValue.real32.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.float_val;
2758 break;
2759 case RVS_TYPE_REAL_64:
2760 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_real64_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2761 rpcRegisterValue.real64.value.count = 1;
2762 rpcRegisterValue.real64.value.elements[0] = (double)system_message.value.float_val;
2763 break;
2764 }
2765 clCanard.send_register_access_pending(system_message.node_id, NODE_REGISTER_TIMEOUT_US,
2766 system_message.message, rpcRegisterValue, true);
2767 // Starting message server
2768 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2769 param.system_status->flags.reg_server_running = true;
2770 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2771 message_traced = false;
2772 } else {
2773 // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for setting register
2774 if(!message_traced) {
2775 message_traced = true;
2776 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Register server: Start full power for sending register at node: [ %d ]"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2777 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2778 param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = true;
2779 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2780 }
2781 }
2782 }
2783 }
2784 }
2785 }
2786 }
2787
2788 // La verifica verrà fatta con il Flag Pending resettato e la risposta viene
2789 // popolata nel'apposito registro di state service_module del il servizio relativo
2790 // Il set data avviene in processReciveTranser alle sezioni CanardTransferKindResponse
2791 // Eventuale Flag TimeOut indica un'avvenuta mancata risposta al comando
2792 // Il master una volta inviato il comando deve attendere ResetPending o TimeOutCommand
2793 // Are command server running? Process request or verify END procedure
2794 if(param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running) {
2795
2796 // Check if file server are current in running state
2797 bool cmdServerEnd = true;
2798
2799 for(uint8_t cmd_server_queueId=0; cmd_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; cmd_server_queueId++) {
2800
2801 // state != standby? Running current procedure...
2802 if(clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.is_pending())
2803 cmdServerEnd = false;
2804
2805 if (clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.event_timeout()) {
2806 // Rimuovo gli stati
2807 clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.reset_pending();
2808 // TimeOUT di un comando in attesa... gestisco il da farsi Retry? Abort? Signal?
2809 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Command server: time out command at Node: [ %d ], Warning [restore pending command]\r\n"),
2810 clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2811 }
2812 if (clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.is_executed()) {
2813 // Rimuovo gli stati
2814 clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.reset_pending();
2815 // Command OK. Signal?
2816 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Command server: confirmed command at Node: [ %d ], response code value: [ %d ]\r\n"),
2817 clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id(), clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.get_response());
2818 }
2819 }
2820
2821 // End server distribution command
2822 if(cmdServerEnd) {
2823 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2824 param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running = false;
2825 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2826 }
2827 } else {
2828 // Security off pending status
2829 for(uint8_t cmd_server_queueId=0; cmd_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; cmd_server_queueId++) {
2830 clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.reset_pending();
2831 }
2832 }
2833 // ************************* END COMMAND SERVER **************************
2834
2835 // La verifica verrà fatta con il Flag Pending resettato e la risposta viene
2836 // popolata nel'apposito registro di state service_module del il servizio relativo
2837 // Il set data avviene in processReciveTranser alle sezioni CanardTransferKindResponse
2838 // Eventuale Flag TimeOut indica un'avvenuta mancata risposta al comando
2839 // Il master una volta inviato il registro deve attendere ResetPending o TimeOutCommand
2840 // Are register server running? Process request or verify END procedure
2841 // Configure method (list_register_sequence) are prioritary. If running configuration server
2842 // register server it shouldn't work at all. Only at the end can be completed...
2843 if((param.system_status->flags.reg_server_running)&&
2844 (!param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running)) {
2845
2846 // Check if file server are current in running state
2847 bool regServerEnd = true;
2848
2849 for(uint8_t reg_server_queueId=0; reg_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; reg_server_queueId++) {
2850
2851 // state != standby? Running current procedure...
2852 if(clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.is_pending())
2853 regServerEnd = false;
2854
2855 if (clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.event_timeout()) {
2856 // Rimuovo gli stati
2857 clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
2858 // TimeOUT di un comando in attesa... gestisco il da farsi Retry? Abort? Signal?
2859 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Register server: time out command at Node: [ %d ], Warning [restore pending command]\r\n"),
2860 clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2861 }
2862 if (clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.is_executed()) {
2863 // Rimuovo gli stati
2864 clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
2865 // Command OK.
2866 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: confirmed modify value at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2867 }
2868 }
2869
2870 // End server distribution command
2871 if(regServerEnd) {
2872 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2873 param.system_status->flags.reg_server_running = false;
2874 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2875 }
2876 } else {
2877 // Security off pending status
2878 for(uint8_t reg_server_queueId=0; reg_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; reg_server_queueId++) {
2879 clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
2880 }
2881 }
2882 // ************************* END REGISTER SERVER *************************
2883
2884
2885 // ***********************************************************************
2886 // ****** REMOTE REGISTER GET/SET SERVER AND REMOTE CONFIGURATION *******
2887 // ***********************************************************************
2888
2889 // Avvio configurazione remota automatica su richiesta slave (Appena CONFIGURATO da PNP)
2890 // La procedura parte solo senza register_server in funzione (un solo avvio ammesso)
2891 // Si avvia generalmente dopo il PnP o su un modulo parzialmente configurato con solo il node_id
2892 if((param.system_status->flags.run_module_configure)&&
2893 (!param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running)) {
2894 for(uint8_t cfg_remote_queueId=0; cfg_remote_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; cfg_remote_queueId++) {
2895 // Check Configurazione non attiva su un nodo configurato e online
2896 // FALSE se il nodo non è configurato nei reglistri Metadati e Porte RMAP
2897 // Determino se avviare la configfurazione di un nodo apprena programmato con PnP...
2898 // O comunque di un nodo preventivamente programmato con node_id ma senza metadati
2899 if(clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].is_online()) {
2900 // N.B: Se ho appena terminato la procedura HeratBeat potrebbe essere arrivato con Status Update request,
2901 // Quindi non eseguo la configurazione, e attendo l'eleimnazione del flag e la rilettura dello stato remoto cfg
2902 // Anche nel caso di configurazione già in corso non processo il comando. Esco e attendo la fine del PNP/CFG
2903 if((!clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].heartbeat.get_module_ready()) &&
2904 (!remote_configure_reboot[cfg_remote_queueId]) &&
2905 (!remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId])) {
2906 // Module not configured.
2907 // Starting configuration procedure with push command to queue
2908 // Queue gestion power UP, starting command ecc... is performed
2909 // After terminate procedure and reboot remote Node. Configuration is ready
2910 system_message_t system_message = {0};
2911 system_message.task_dest = CAN_TASK_ID;
2912 system_message.command.do_remote_cfg = true;
2913 system_message.node_id = cfg_remote_queueId;
2914 param.systemMessageQueue->Enqueue(&system_message, 0);
2915 }
2916 }
2917 }
2918 }
2919
2920 // Get coda config register da system_message... se richiesto comando da LCD, RPC Remota, PNP
2921 // Avvia la configurazione remota con la sequenza dei registri da programmare
2922 // LA configurazione può essere avviato solo con nodo già configurato almeno con port_id Valido
2923 // Evidentemente un nodo non ancora assegnato può essere configurato solo dopo assegnamento PNP del port_id
2924 // Al termine del PnP port_id, deve essere avviata sempre la procedura di configurazione del nodo remoto
2925 if(!param.systemMessageQueue->IsEmpty()) {
2926 // Message queue is for CAN (If FW Upgrade local Master, Message is for SD...)
2927 if(param.systemMessageQueue->Peek(&system_message, 0)) {
2928 // Only local task post message queue can be processed here
2929 // Messages checked here can only be addressed to remote slaves. So the addresses must be in the valid area
2930 if((system_message.task_dest == LOCAL_TASK_ID) && (system_message.node_id < MAX_NODE_CONNECT)) {
2931 // ENTER PROCEDURE CONFIG (Only Full POWERED Module!!!)
2932 if(system_message.command.do_remote_cfg) {
2933 // Try to configure and Waiting OnLine ( If already On Line nothing todo )
2934 clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].configure(
2935 param.configuration->board_slave[system_message.node_id].can_address,
2936 param.configuration->board_slave[system_message.node_id].module_type,
2937 param.configuration->board_slave[system_message.node_id].can_port_id,
2938 param.configuration->board_slave[system_message.node_id].can_publish_id,
2939 param.configuration->board_slave[system_message.node_id].serial_number);
2940 // If node is not online, remove command from the queue... Configuration is impossible
2941 // Queue must to be free !!!
2942 if(!clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].is_online()) {
2943 if(!remote_configure_wait_online_ms[system_message.node_id]) {
2944 remote_configure_wait_online_ms[system_message.node_id] = millis();
2945 } else {
2946 // Configuration impossible Module not Found OnLine after 4 sec from New Configuration
2947 if(millis() - remote_configure_wait_online_ms[system_message.node_id] > 4000) {
2948 // Remove message from the queue (No more action possible here NOT Online)
2949 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
2950 }
2951 }
2952 } else {
2953 // Start Flag Event Start when request configuration is request
2954 // When remote node recive VSC from Master Heartbeat Remote slave FullPower is performed
2955 // Then new state for slave (fullpower) are resend to master. If Ok procedure can start
2956 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on) {
2957 // Remove message from the queue (ONLY IF REMOTE NODE IS FULL POWERED!!!)
2958 remote_configure_wait_online_ms[system_message.node_id] = 0;
2959 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
2960 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id() <= CANARD_NODE_ID_MAX) {
2961 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: Modify configuration at already configured module stimacan: [ %d ], current node id [ %d ]\r\n"), system_message.node_id + 1, clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2962 } else {
2963 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: Start configuration at new module stimacan: [ %d ]\r\n"), system_message.node_id + 1);
2964 }
2965 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].is_online()) {
2966 // START Remote configuration of Node -> system_message.node_id
2967 remote_configure[system_message.node_id] = REGISTER_STARTING;
2968 remote_configure_retry[system_message.node_id] = NODE_REGISTER_MAX_RETRY;
2969 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2970 param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running = true;
2971 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2972 } else {
2973 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id() <= CANARD_NODE_ID_MAX) {
2974 // Off line ... Not configure?
2975 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: ALERT stimacan: [ %d ], node id [ %d ] is OFF LINE. Node cannot be configured [ %s ]\r\n"), system_message.node_id + 1, clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id(), ABORT_STRING);
2976 } else {
2977 // not configured yet (waitinq request PNP) ?
2978 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: PNP save parameter for module stimacan: [ %d ]. Configuration is ready for remote PNP request.\r\n"),system_message.node_id + 1);
2979 }
2980 }
2981 } else {
2982 // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for type of command (if not yet request full power)
2983 if(!param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request) {
2984 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Configuration module: Start full power for sending queue of command configuration to slave, old power state: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode());
2985 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2986 param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = true;
2987 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2988 }
2989 }
2990 }
2991 }
2992 }
2993 }
2994 }
2995
2996 // Are configuration remote node in execution?
2997 if(param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running) {
2998 // Check end of configure remote module
2999 bool cfgConfigureEnd = true;
3000 uint8_t sensorCount = 0;
3001 bool reCheckEndEvent = false; // True if end of one programming (recheck back end of server register running)
3002 // loop for all Node and switching from list command sequence.
3003 // Create and send register command and wait progression in server command procedure
3004 for(uint8_t cfg_remote_queueId=0; cfg_remote_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; cfg_remote_queueId++) {
3005 // Are configuration in progress for the node. Check type and sensor count for all parameter
3006 // Node request to be online
3007 if(remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId]) {
3008 // Configure module is in running mode
3009 cfgConfigureEnd = false;
3010 if(clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].is_online()) {
3011 // Start comand only start without old pending comand
3012 if(clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].register_access.is_pending()) {
3013 // Pending command is active, Waiting Server Register elaborate Response or TimeOUT
3014 break;
3015 } else {
3016 // Starting or continue procedure configuration STEP by STEP
3017 switch(param.configuration->board_slave[cfg_remote_queueId].module_type) {
3018 // Prepare sensor count to send limit metadata to remote register for remote module type
3019 // starting "type"... verified with starting sensorId = SETUP_ID for correct sequence command
3020 case Module_Type::th:
3021 sensorCount = SENSOR_METADATA_TH_COUNT;
3022 break;
3023 case Module_Type::rain:
3024 sensorCount = SENSOR_METADATA_RAIN_COUNT;
3025 break;
3026 case Module_Type::wind:
3027 sensorCount = SENSOR_METADATA_WIND_COUNT;
3028 break;
3029 case Module_Type::radiation:
3030 sensorCount = SENSOR_METADATA_RADIATION_COUNT;
3031 break;
3032 case Module_Type::power:
3033 sensorCount = SENSOR_METADATA_POWER_COUNT;
3034 break;
3035 case Module_Type::vwc:
3036 sensorCount = SENSOR_METADATA_VWC_COUNT;
3037 break;
3038 }
3039 // *******************************************
3040 // **** STEP -> CONFIGURATION PROGRESSION ****
3041 // *******************************************
3042 // RETURN NEXT STEP OR END FROM INTERPRET COMMAND EXECUTING
3043 // x SPECIFICHE UAVCAN ->
3044 // NB Il tipo di registro deve essere == (es. Natural32) e deve esistere sul nodo Remoto !!!
3045 // Altrimenti la funzione deve fallire e ritornare NULL
3046 // Quindi il Master deve conoscere la tipologia di registro e nome dello SLAVE
3047 // Non è possibile creare un registro senza uscire dalle specifiche (es. comando vendor_specific)
3048 // Preparo il registro (Inifluente se l'operazione è di sola lettura parametro -> write)
3049 // RESPONSE -> AFTER REQUEST AND VERIFY:
3050 // La verifica verrà fatta con il Flag Pending resettato e la risposta viene
3051 // popolata nel'apposito registro di state service_module del il servizio relativo
3052 // Il set data avviene in processReciveTranser alle sezioni CanardTransferKindResponse
3053 // Eventuale Flag TimeOut indica un'avvenuta mancata risposta al comando
3054 // Il master una volta inviato il comando deve attendere ResetPending o TimeOutCommand
3055 // Reset register do void (security check TX/RX Value )
3056 memset(&val, 0, sizeof(uavcan_register_Value_1_0));
3057 switch (remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId])
3058 {
3059 case REGISTER_01_SEND:
3060 // Register-01 ( Configure Metadata register LEVEL.L1 )
3061 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_natural16_(&val);
3062 val.natural16.value.count = sensorCount;
3063 for(uint8_t id=0; id<sensorCount; id++) {
3064 val.natural16.value.elements[id] = param.configuration->board_slave[cfg_remote_queueId].metadata[id].level1;
3065 }
3066 // Send register value to Slave Remote with parameter to store
3067 clCanard.send_register_access_pending(cfg_remote_queueId, NODE_REGISTER_TIMEOUT_US,
3068 REGISTER_METADATA_LEVEL_L1, val, NODE_REGISTER_WRITING);
3069 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Register server: Send %s at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), REGISTER_METADATA_LEVEL_L1, clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].get_node_id());
3070 // Prepare verify RESPONSE Method OK.
3071 remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId]++;

3079 }

3081 clCanard.send_register_access_pending(cfg_remote_queueId, NODE_REGISTER_TIMEOUT_US,
3082 REGISTER_METADATA_LEVEL_L2, val, NODE_REGISTER_MAX_RETRY);
3083 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Register server: Send %s at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), REGISTER_METADATA_LEVEL_L2, clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].get_node_id());
3084 // Prepare verify RESPONSE Method OK.
3085 remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId]++;

3100 break;

3119 for(uint8_t id=0; id<sensorCount; id++) {

3130 // Register-06 ( Configure Metadata TIME PIndicator )
3131 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_natural8_(&val);
3132 val.natural8.value.count = sensorCount;
3133 for(uint8_t id=0; id<sensorCount; id++) {
3134 val.natural8.value.elements[id] = param.configuration->board_slave[cfg_remote_queueId].metadata[id].timerangePindicator;

3140 // Prepare verify RESPONSE Method OK.
3141 remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId]++;
3142 break;
3143 case REGISTER_07_SEND:
3144 // Register-07 ( Configure Can SUBJECT ID Rmap Publish )
3145 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_natural16_(&val);
3146 val.natural16.value.count = 1;
3147 val.natural16.value.elements[0] = param.configuration->board_slave[cfg_remote_queueId].can_publish_id;
3148 // Send register value to Slave Remote with parameter to store
3149 clCanard.send_register_access_pending(cfg_remote_queueId, NODE_REGISTER_TIMEOUT_US,
3150 REGISTER_UAVCAN_DATA_PUBLISH, val, NODE_REGISTER_MAX_RETRY);
3151 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Register server: Send %s at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), REGISTER_UAVCAN_DATA_PUBLISH, clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].get_node_id());
3152 // Prepare verify RESPONSE Method OK.
3153 remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId]++;
3154 break;
3155 case REGISTER_08_SEND:
3156 // Register-08 ( Configure Can Address if rquired != old value )
3157 if(clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].get_node_id() != param.configuration->board_slave[cfg_remote_queueId].can_address) {
3158 uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_natural16_(&val);
3159 val.natural16.value.count = 1;
3160 val.natural16.value.elements[0] = param.configuration->board_slave[cfg_remote_queueId].can_address;
3161 // Send register value to Slave Remote with parameter to store
3162 clCanard.send_register_access_pending(cfg_remote_queueId, NODE_REGISTER_TIMEOUT_US,
3163 REGISTER_UAVCAN_NODE_ID, val, NODE_REGISTER_MAX_RETRY);
3164 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Register server: Send %s at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), REGISTER_UAVCAN_NODE_ID, clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].get_node_id());
3165 // Prepare verify RESPONSE Method OK.
3166 remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId]++;
3167 } else {
3168 // End of programming
3169 remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId] = REGISTER_COMPLETE;
3170 }
3171 break;
3172 case REGISTER_COMPLETE:
3173 // NEXT COMMAND LINE HERE....
3174 // L2..LType ecc... Node, Service, PortId, ServernodeId NodeId (LAST!!!) END!!!
3175 // END PROGRAMMING REGISTER REMOTE LIST OK !!!!
3176 remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId] = 0;
3177 // Ricordo di avere riavviato. Non riconfiguro fino a rx nuovo HeartBeat con stato valido
3178 remote_configure_reboot[cfg_remote_queueId] = true;
3179 // Attendo fino a 10 secondi per nuvo controllo stato da OFF Server Register End
3180 remote_configure_end_ms = millis() + 10000;
3181 // Try end of all event recheck control
3182 reCheckEndEvent = true;
3183 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: Send register configuration completed for Node: [ %d ]. Send reboot method to slave\r\n"), clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].get_node_id());
3184 // *******************************************************************************
3185 // Sending Reboot command to slave node remote CFG COMPLETE WITHOUT PENDING METHOD
3186 // *******************************************************************************
3187 // Direct command (without pending) must send with NodeId not with istance !!!
3188 clCanard.send_command(clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].get_node_id(), NODE_COMMAND_TIMEOUT_US,
3189 uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Request_1_1_COMMAND_RESTART, NULL, 0);
3190 default:
3191 // Riparto dal comando precedente precedente se nell'area di validità
3192 // Il comando in stato di attesa non ha avuto esito positivo
3193 if(clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].register_access.event_timeout()) {
3194 clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
3195 if((remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId]>REGISTER_01_SEND)&&
3196 (remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId]<REGISTER_08_SEND)) {
3197 remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId]--;
3198 }
3199 else {
3200 remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId] = 0;
3201 }
3202 }
3203 break;
3204 }
3205 }
3206 } else {
3207 // Node is OFF_LINE Procedure ERROR
3208 remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId] = 0;
3209 // Try end of all event recheck control
3210 reCheckEndEvent = true;
3211 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Register server: ALERT Node: [ %d ] is OFF LINE. Remote configuration [ %s ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].get_node_id(), ABORT_STRING);
3212 }
3213 }
3214 }
3215 // Next reckeck immediatly end event server register running
3216 if(reCheckEndEvent) {
3217 cfgConfigureEnd = true;
3218 for(uint8_t cfg_remote_queueId=0; cfg_remote_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; cfg_remote_queueId++) {
3219 if(remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId]) {
3220 cfgConfigureEnd = false;
3221 break;
3222 }
3223 }
3224 }
3225 // End of configure procedure complete request
3226 if(cfgConfigureEnd) {
3227 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
3228 param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running = false;
3229 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
3230 }
3231 }
3232
3233 // Register SERVER Gestion Pending, Response and TimeOut
3234 // NB. To Set parameter Register with value remote create a register and call send method
3235 // To read a register create register and set to unstructured and call send method. (Rx is performed)
3236 if(param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running) {
3237 // loop for all Node and switching from list command sequence.
3238 // Create and send register command and wait progression in server command procedure
3239 for(uint8_t register_server_queueId=0; register_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; register_server_queueId++) {
3240 if (clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].register_access.event_timeout()) {
3241 // Reset del pending comando
3242 clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
3243 // TimeOUT di un comando in attesa... gestisco il da farsi
3244 if(remote_configure[register_server_queueId]) {
3245 // Abort configuration (after retry...)
3246 if(remote_configure_retry[register_server_queueId]) {
3247 remote_configure_retry[register_server_queueId]--;
3248 // Retry sending last command register (state proc - 1)
3249 remote_configure[register_server_queueId]--;
3250 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Register server: Command Node: [ %d ] not responding to param request. Remaining retry send command: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].get_node_id(), remote_configure_retry[register_server_queueId]);
3251 } else {
3252 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Register server: ALERT Node: [ %d ] not responding to param request. Remote configuration [ %s ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].get_node_id(), ABORT_STRING);
3253 remote_configure[register_server_queueId] = 0;
3254 }
3255 } else {
3256 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Register server: ALERT Node: [ %d ] not responding to param request. Command [ %s ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].get_node_id(), ABORT_STRING);
3257 }
3258 }
3259 if (clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].register_access.is_executed()) {
3260 // Reset del pending comando
3261 clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
3262 if(remote_configure[register_server_queueId]) {
3263 // Pass to NEXT REGISTER increment swotch position end to REGISTER_COMPLETE value
3264 remote_configure[register_server_queueId]++;
3265 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Register server: Recive register R/W response from node in configure sequence: [ %d ]. Register access [ %s ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].get_node_id(), OK_STRING);
3266 } else {
3267 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Register server: Recive register R/W response from node: [ %d ]. Register access [ %s ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].get_node_id(), OK_STRING);
3268 }
3269 val = clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].register_access.get_response();
3270 // se risposta registr != da empty in request il registro è impostato o letto (se empty = non esiste)
3271 if(val._tag_) // !=0 (!= empty)
3272 {
3273 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Register server: check response from node: [ %d ]. Register setted [ %s ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].get_node_id(), OK_STRING);
3274 } else {
3275 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Register server: check response from node: [ %d ]. Register setted [ %s ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[register_server_queueId].get_node_id(), ERROR_STRING);
3276 // Abort configuration without Retry (Command refused)
3277 remote_configure[register_server_queueId] = 0;
3278 }
3279 }
3280 }
3281 } else {
3282 // Mantengo off il segnale di reboot inviato (sempre pronto ad una nuova configurazione...)
3283 for(uint8_t register_server_queueId=0; register_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; register_server_queueId++) {
3284 if(remote_configure_reboot[register_server_queueId]) {
3285 // Se passo il timeOut di fine configurazione e riavvio Nodo posso eliminare il segnale di WaitReboot
3286 if(millis() > remote_configure_end_ms) {
3287 remote_configure_reboot[register_server_queueId] = false;
3288 }
3289 }
3290 }
3291 }
3292 // ***************** FINE TEST COMANDO TX-> RX<- *************************
3293
3294
3295 // ***********************************************************************
3296 // ********************** FILE SERVER (CAN UPLOADER) *********************
3297 // ***********************************************************************
3298 // Se nodo Online, procedo, se passo OffLine interrompo la procedura
3299 // Oppure posso gestire in un timeOut Limitato (L'OffLine è comunque già temporizzato...)
3300 // Invio comando e attendo risposta affermativa, poi passo all'aggiornamento
3301 // NB!!! Rispondo a Request solo se sono nello stato coerente di gestione file upload
3302 // Questo comporta la sicurezza che il nodo non abbia avuto problematiche di genere
3303 // Sia come server che client. Se non sono in coerenza e non rispondo, lo slave andrà
3304 // in TimeOut e la procedura non finisce (senza causare quindi irregolari trasferimenti)
3305 // Al termine del trasferimento, esco dalla modalità >> FILE_STATE_WAIT_COMMAND <<
3306 // direttamente nell' invio dell' ultimo pacchetto dati. E mi preparo a nuovo invio...
3307
3308 // Get coda comandi da system_message... se richiesto aggiornamenti dei firmware completi (tutta la stazione)
3309 if(!param.systemMessageQueue->IsEmpty()) {
3310 // Message queue is for CAN (If FW Upgrade local Master, Message is for SD...)
3311 if(param.systemMessageQueue->Peek(&system_message, 0)) {
3312 // No need to check ID Node (global command...)
3313 if((system_message.task_dest == LOCAL_TASK_ID) && (system_message.command.do_update_all)) {
3314 // Remove message from the queue
3315 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
3316 // Request start update firmware from LCD or Remote RPC
3317 // Start flags and state for file_server start
3318 is_running_update_system = true;
3319 // Start from last boards to first (When 0xFF -> CMD_PARAM_MASTER_ADDRESS) is Master Request and END Procedure upload
3320 index_running_update_boards = MAX_NODE_CONNECT - 1;
3321 }
3322 }
3323 }
3324
3325 // True if Request all system update?! (UP)
3326 // Next start if is avaiable, not running another file server (File Server can be run simultaneously)
3327 // But we update one card at a time and Master for last
3328 if((is_running_update_system)&&(!is_running_update_send_cmd)&&
3329 (!param.system_status->flags.file_server_running)) {
3330 // Have reached the last boards (Master)?
3331 if(index_running_update_boards == CMD_PARAM_MASTER_ADDRESS) {
3332 // Master Boards (Update start from SD Task but mode to request is same with queue)
3333 if(param.system_status->data_master.fw_upgradable) {
3334 memset(&system_message, 0, sizeof(system_message));
3335 // Starting sequence as queue command same LCD/RPC ecc...
3336 system_message.task_dest = SD_TASK_ID;
3337 system_message.command.do_update_fw = true;
3338 system_message.node_id = index_running_update_boards;
3339 param.systemMessageQueue->Enqueue(&system_message);
3340 }
3341 // End of procedure. Master not required updating
3342 is_running_update_system = false;
3343 } else {
3344 // Slave Boards
3345 // Are avaiable one firmware most recent?
3346 if(param.system_status->data_slave[index_running_update_boards].fw_upgradable) {
3347 // Is firmware_updating stopped (waiting end of last operation if started...)
3348 memset(&system_message, 0, sizeof(system_message));
3349 // Inibith procedure uploading while end_event update occurs
3350 // Next check board only without server running and command waiting...
3351 is_running_update_send_cmd = true;
3352 // Starting sequence as queue command same LCD/RPC ecc...
3353 system_message.task_dest = CAN_TASK_ID;
3354 system_message.command.do_update_fw = true;
3355 system_message.node_id = index_running_update_boards;
3356 param.systemMessageQueue->Enqueue(&system_message);
3357 }
3358 // Set check to Next Boards, Update event can start
3359 index_running_update_boards--;
3360 }
3361 }
3362
3363 // Get coda comandi da system_message... se richiesto aggiornamento del firmware
3364 if(!param.systemMessageQueue->IsEmpty()) {
3365 // Message queue is for CAN (If FW Upgrade local Master, Message is only directet to TASK SD...)
3366 if(param.systemMessageQueue->Peek(&system_message, 0)) {
3367 // Only local task post message queue can be processed here
3368 // Messages checked here can only be addressed to remote slaves. So the addresses must be in the valid area
3369 if((system_message.task_dest == LOCAL_TASK_ID) && (system_message.node_id < MAX_NODE_CONNECT)) {
3370 if(system_message.command.do_update_fw) {
3371 // Start Flag Event Start when request configuration is request
3372 // When remote node recive VSC from Master Heartbeat Remote slave FullPower is performed
3373 // Then new state for slave (fullpower) are resend to master. If Ok procedure can start
3374 if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on) {
3375 // Remove message from the queue
3376 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
3377 // Request start update firmware from LCD or Remote RPC
3378 // Start flags and state for file_server start
3379 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
3380 param.system_status->flags.file_server_running = true;
3381 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
3382 // Set STATE for boards request in firmware upgrade
3383 clCanard.slave[(uint8_t)system_message.node_id].file_server.start_state();
3384 message_traced = false;
3385 } else {
3386 // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for type of command
3387 if(!message_traced) {
3388 message_traced = true;
3389 TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Command server: Start full power for sending firmware at node: [ %d ]"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
3390 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
3391 param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = true;
3392 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
3393 }
3394 }
3395 }
3396 }
3397 }
3398 }
3399
3400 // Are file server running? Process request or verify END procedure
3401 if(param.system_status->flags.file_server_running) {
3402
3403 // Check if file server are current in running state
3404 bool fileServerEnd = true;
3405
3406 for(uint8_t file_server_queueId=0; file_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; file_server_queueId++) {
3407
3408 // state != standby? Running current procedure...
3409 if(clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.get_state() != canardClass::FileServer_State::standby)
3410 fileServerEnd = false;
3411
3412 // Se vado OffLine la procedura comunque viene interrotta dall'evento di OffLine
3413 switch(clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.get_state()) {
3414 default: // -->> FILE_STATE_ERROR STATE:
3415 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.end_transmission();
3416 break;
3417 case canardClass::FileServer_State::standby:
3418 // Nothing to do. Start Case is external from this state
3419 // The current boards are in normal state. Check next boards...
3420 break;
3421 case canardClass::FileServer_State::start_request:
3422 // Starting request remote from any system
3423 char file_name[CAN_FILE_NAME_SIZE_MAX];
3424 // Set correct name of file from last avaiable (by module)
3425 for(uint8_t iAvaiableFw=0; iAvaiableFw<STIMA_MODULE_TYPE_MAX_AVAIABLE; iAvaiableFw++) {
3426 // Found corrispondence from avaiable firmware and module type installed
3427 // Retrive name firmware to get up
3428 if(param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[iAvaiableFw].module_type ==
3429 param.system_status->data_slave[file_server_queueId].module_type) {
3430 setStimaFirmwareName(file_name,
3431 param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[iAvaiableFw].module_type,
3432 param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[iAvaiableFw].version,
3433 param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[iAvaiableFw].revision);
3434 break;
3435 TRACE_INFO_F(F("File server: Prepare trasmission file firmware at node: [ %d ]. File name [ %s ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].get_node_id(), file_name);
3436 }
3437 }
3438 // Start upload file with module_type last version found on SD Card
3439 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.set_file_name(file_name, true);
3440 break;
3441 case canardClass::FileServer_State::begin_update:
3442 // Avvio comando di aggiornamento, controllo coerenza ed esistenza file già effettuato
3443 // Se non ci sono altre problematiche (aggiornamenti vari, download blocchi ecc.. avvio...)
3444 // Avvio il comando nel nodo remoto
3445 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.next_state();
3446 TRACE_INFO_F(F("File server: Starting trasmission command download firmware at node: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].get_node_id());
3447 // altrimenti Annullo la richiesta (Invio Error al Remoto su Request File)
3448 // O smetto di rispondere al servizio per quella richiesta (TimeOut)
3449 // clCanard.slave[queueId].file_server.end_transmission(); -> ANNULLA!!!
3450 break;
3451 case canardClass::FileServer_State::command_send:
3452 // Invio comando di aggiornamento File (in attesa in coda con switch...)
3453 // Il comando viene inviato solamente senza altri Pending di Comandi (come semaforo)
3454 if(!clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].command.is_pending()) {
3455 // Imposta il pending del comando per verifica sequenza TX-RX e il TimeOut
3456 // Imposta la risposta del comadno A UNDEFINED (verrà settato al valore corretto in risposta)
3457 // Il comando comunica la presenza del file di download nel remoto e avvia dowload
3458 clCanard.send_command_file_server_pending(file_server_queueId, NODE_COMMAND_TIMEOUT_US);
3459 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.next_state();
3460 }
3461 break;
3462 case canardClass::FileServer_State::command_wait:
3463 // Attendo la risposta del Nodo Remoto conferma, errore o TimeOut
3464 if(clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].command.event_timeout()) {
3465 // Counico al server l'errore di timeOut Command Update Start ed esco
3466 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.end_transmission();
3467 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("File server: Node [ %d ], TimeOut Command Start Send file, uploading %s\r\n"),
3468 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].get_node_id(), ABORT_STRING);
3469 // Se decido di uscire nella procedura di OffLine, la comunicazione
3470 // al server di eventuali errori deve essere gestita al momento dell'OffLine
3471 }
3472 // Comando eseguito,verifico la correttezza della risposta
3473 if(clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].command.is_executed()) {
3474 // La risposta si trova in command_response fon flag pending azzerrato.
3475 if(clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].command.get_response() ==
3476 uavcan_node_ExecuteCommand_Response_1_1_STATUS_SUCCESS) {
3477 // Sequenza terminata, avvio il file transfer !!!
3478 // Essendo una procedura server e non avendo nessun controllo sui comandi
3479 // La classe si limita a fornire gli elementi di controllo timeOut per
3480 // la verifica di coerenza e gestione del download dal remoto ed internamente
3481 // gestisco le fasi dell'upload. Non è richiesta nessun altra gestione e per
3482 // comodità gestisco l'aggiornamento del timeOut direttamente nella callBack
3483 // nella sezione request del file dallo slave.
3484 // Avvio il flag di aggiornamento corrente in corso... a Display
3485 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
3486 param.system_status->data_slave[file_server_queueId].is_fw_upgrading = true;
3487 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
3488 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.next_state();
3489 // Stampo lo stato
3490 TRACE_INFO_F(F("File server: Node [ %d ] upload Start Send file %s\r\n"),
3491 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].get_node_id(), OK_STRING);
3492 // Imposto il timeOUT per controllo Deadline con pending per sequenza di download
3493 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.start_pending(NODE_REQFILE_TIMEOUT_US);
3494 } else {
3495 // Errore comando eseguito ma risposta non valida. Annullo il trasferimento
3496 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.end_transmission();
3497 // ...counico al server (RMAP remoto) l'errore per il mancato aggiornamento ed esco
3498 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("File server: Node [ %d ] response Cmd Error in Send file %s\r\n"),
3499 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].get_node_id(), ABORT_STRING);
3500 }
3501 }
3502 break;
3503 case canardClass::FileServer_State::state_uploading:
3504 // Attendo la risposta del Nodo Remoto conferma, errore o TimeOut
3505 if(clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.event_timeout()) {
3506 // Counico al server l'errore di timeOut Command Update Start ed esco
3507 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.end_transmission();
3508 TRACE_ERROR_F(F("File server: Node [ %d ] TimeOut Request/Response send file %s\r\n"),
3509 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].get_node_id(), ABORT_STRING);
3510 // Se decido di uscire nella procedura di OffLine, la comunicazione
3511 // al server di eventuali errori deve essere gestita al momento dell'OffLine
3512 }
3513 // Evento completato (file_server) terminato con successo, vado a step finale
3514 if(clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.is_executed()) {
3515 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.next_state();
3516 }
3517 break;
3518 case canardClass::FileServer_State::upload_complete:
3519 // Counico al server file upload Complete ed esco (nuova procedura ready)
3520 // -> EXIT FROM FILE_STATE_STANDBY ( In procedura di SendFileBlock )
3521 // Quando invio l'ultimo pacchetto dati valido ( Blocco < 256 Bytes )
3522 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].file_server.end_transmission();
3523 TRACE_INFO_F(F("File server: Node [ %d ] uploading completed %s\r\n"),
3524 clCanard.slave[file_server_queueId].get_node_id(), OK_STRING);
3525 break;
3526 }
3527 }
3528
3529 // End of Running file server...
3530 if(fileServerEnd) {
3531 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
3532 param.system_status->flags.file_server_running = false;
3533 for(uint8_t file_server_queueId=0; file_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; file_server_queueId++) {
3534 param.system_status->data_slave[file_server_queueId].is_fw_upgrading = false;
3535 }
3536 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
3537 // End command if started for update_all system RPC. Irrelevant in other cases.
3538 is_running_update_send_cmd = false;
3539 }
3540 }
3541 // ********************* END FILE SERVER CAN UPLOADER ********************
3542
3543 // *********************************************************************
3544 // Inibith Reboot Module and GET Full Power for all Module in this case
3545 // *********************************************************************
3546 if((param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request)&&
3547 ((param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running)||
3548 (param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running)||
3549 (param.system_status->flags.reg_server_running)||
3550 (param.system_status->flags.file_server_running))) {
3551 // Reset request full_wakeup_request is needed and valid while any server mode is started
3552 // Flag is setted at start of server if mode power is not full_power and must be reset
3553 // when activity_server programmed is terminated. When a server start, flag must to be resetted
3554 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
3555 param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = false;
3556 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
3557 }
3558 // *** INIBITH REBOOT LOCAL AND REMOTE RPC ***
3559 if(((param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running)||
3560 (param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running)||
3561 (param.system_status->flags.reg_server_running)||
3562 (param.system_status->flags.file_server_running)||
3563 (param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request)) &&
3564 (!param.system_status->flags.inibith_reboot)) {
3565 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
3566 param.system_status->flags.inibith_reboot = true;
3567 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
3568 }
3569 // *** RESTORE REBOOT LOCAL AND REMOTE RPC ***
3570 if(((!param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running)&&
3571 (!param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running)&&
3572 (!param.system_status->flags.reg_server_running)&&
3573 (!param.system_status->flags.file_server_running) &&
3574 (!param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request)) &&
3575 (param.system_status->flags.inibith_reboot)) {
3576 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
3577 param.system_status->flags.inibith_reboot = false;
3578 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
3579 }
3580 // *** FULL POWER Operation Request (RPC, Remote config, command, display) ***
3581 if(((param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_forced)||
3582 (param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request)||
3583 (param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running)||
3584 (param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running)||
3585 (param.system_status->flags.reg_server_running)||
3586 (param.system_status->flags.file_server_running)||
3587 (param.system_status->flags.rmap_server_running)||
3588 (bStartupGetIstant)||
3589 (param.system_status->flags.display_on)) &&
3590 (param.system_status->flags.power_state != Power_Mode::pwr_on)) {
3591 // Disable module sleep if need operation into Class
3592 // Comunicate to the network CAN FullPower request. All Node exit DeepSleep and enter FullPower
3593 clCanard.flag.disable_sleep();
3594 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
3595 // Report Full POWER request for operation specific Task
3596 param.system_status->flags.power_state = Power_Mode::pwr_on;
3597 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
3598 // Applicate command for All Network UAVCAN
3599 clCanard.flag.set_local_power_mode(param.system_status->flags.power_state);
3600 }
3601 // *** NORMAL POWER Operation Request (End of RPC, Remote config, command, display) ***
3602 if(((!param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_forced)&&
3603 (!param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request)&&
3604 (!param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running)&&
3605 (!param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running)&&
3606 (!param.system_status->flags.reg_server_running)&&
3607 (!param.system_status->flags.file_server_running)&&
3608 (!param.system_status->flags.rmap_server_running)&&
3609 (!bStartupGetIstant)&&
3610 (!param.system_status->flags.display_on)) &&
3611 (param.system_status->flags.power_state == Power_Mode::pwr_on)) {
3612 // Enable module sleep if need operation into Class
3613 // Comunicate to the network CAN nominal power request. All Node enable DeepSleep and exit FullPower
3614 clCanard.flag.enable_sleep();
3615 param.systemStatusLock->Take();
3616 // Normal POWER request for operation specific. If critical Power... Power Critical mode is selected
3617 // Depending from MPPT Level status Critical for Other Method
3618 if(param.system_status->flags.power_critical) {
3619 param.system_status->flags.power_state = Power_Mode::pwr_critical;
3620 } else {
3621 param.system_status->flags.power_state = Power_Mode::pwr_nominal;
3622 }
3623 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
3624 // Applicate command for All Network UAVCAN
3625 clCanard.flag.set_local_power_mode(param.system_status->flags.power_state);
3626 }
3627 // ***********************************************************************
3628
3629
3630 // **************************************************************************
3631 // -> Scheduler temporizzato dei messaggi standard da inviare alla rete UAVCAN
3632 // **************************************************************************
3633 // ************************* HEARTBEAT DATA PUBLISHER ***********************
3634 // Abilita pubblicazione HB con upgrade_fw per segnalare lo start. Solo senza inibizione Reboot
3635 // Altrimenti entrerebbe di continuo nel Publish fino al reboot
3636 if(((start_firmware_upgrade) && (!param.system_status->flags.inibith_reboot)) ||
3637 (clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.syncronized_time) >= last_pub_heartbeat)) {
3638 // Startup FullPower to get istant value counter OFF (Synch to Numb Pub of HeartBeat)
3639 if(bStartupCount) {
3640 bStartupCount--;
3641 if(!bStartupCount) bStartupGetIstant = false;
3642 }
3643 // Publish HeartBeat
3644 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Publish MASTER Heartbeat -->> [ %u sec]\r\n"), TIME_PUBLISH_HEARTBEAT);
3645 clCanard.master_heartbeat_send_message();
3646 // Update next publisher
3647 last_pub_heartbeat = clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.syncronized_time) + MEGA * TIME_PUBLISH_HEARTBEAT;
3648 }
3649 // LOOP HANDLER >> 1 SECONDO << TIME SYNCRO (alternato 0.5 sec con Heartbeat)
3650 if (clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.syncronized_time) >= next_timesyncro_msg)
3651 {
3652 next_timesyncro_msg = clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.syncronized_time) + MEGA;
3653 // Time syncro are sended only when full power is enabled
3654 if(param.system_status->flags.power_state == Power_Mode::pwr_on) {
3655 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Publish MASTER Time Syncronization -->> [1 sec]\r\n"));
3656 clCanard.master_timestamp_send_syncronization();
3657 }
3658 }
3659 // ********************** SERVICE PORT LIST PUBLISHER ***********************
3660 if (clCanard.flag.get_local_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on) {
3661 if (clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.syncronized_time) >= last_pub_port_list) {
3662 // Publish list service only if full power mode are selected
3663 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Publish Local PORT LIST -->> [ %u sec]\r\n"), TIME_PUBLISH_PORT_LIST);
3664 last_pub_port_list = clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.syncronized_time) + MEGA * TIME_PUBLISH_PORT_LIST;
3665 // Update publisher
3666 clCanard.master_servicelist_send_message();
3667 }
3668 } else {
3669 // Mantengo il publish Port avanti nel tempo e Avvio solo a MAX Power e tempo
3670 // di pubblicazione interamente trascorso. Evita Publish inutile in Request PowerUP
3671 // da Master, per semplici operazioni di lettura e/o configurazione ( In Power::Sleep )
3672 last_pub_port_list = clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.syncronized_time);
3673 }
3674
3675 // ***************************************************************************
3676 // Gestione Coda messaggi in trasmissione (ciclo di svuotamento messaggi)
3677 // ***************************************************************************
3678 // Transmit pending frames, avvia la trasmissione gestita da canard a priorità.
3679 // Il metodo può essere chiamato direttamente in preparazione messaggio x coda
3680 if (clCanard.transmitQueueDataPresent()) {
3681 // Access driver con semaforo
3682 if(param.canLock->Take(Ticks::MsToTicks(CAN_SEMAPHORE_MAX_WAITING_TIME_MS))) {
3683 clCanard.transmitQueue();
3684 param.canLock->Give();
3685 }
3686 }
3687
3688 // ***************************************************************************
3689 // Gestione Coda messaggi in ricezione (ciclo di caricamento messaggi)
3690 // ***************************************************************************
3691 // Gestione con Intererupt RX Only esterna (verifica dati in coda gestionale)
3692 if (clCanard.receiveQueueDataPresent()) {
3693 // Log Packet
3694 #ifdef LOG_RX_PACKET
3695 char logMsg[50];
3696 clCanard.receiveQueue(logMsg);
3697 TRACE_DEBUG_F(F("RX [ %s ]\r\n"), logMsg);
3698 #else
3699 clCanard.receiveQueue();
3700 #endif
3701 }
3702
3703 // Request Reboot from RPC in security mode
3704 if(!param.systemMessageQueue->IsEmpty()) {
3705 // Message queue is for CAN (If FW Upgrade local Master, Message is for SD...)
3706 if(param.systemMessageQueue->Peek(&system_message, 0)) {
3707 // ENTER PROCEDURE CONFIG (Only Full POWERED Module!!!)
3708 // Global message no required check nodeId area validation
3709 if((system_message.task_dest == LOCAL_TASK_ID) && (system_message.command.do_reboot)) {
3710 param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
3711 // Start Reboot check state
3712 clCanard.flag.request_system_restart();
3713 }
3714 }
3715 }
3716 // Request Reboot (Firmware upgrade direct... Or Request Reset with inibit control)
3717 if (!param.system_status->flags.inibith_reboot) {
3718 if (clCanard.flag.is_requested_system_restart() || (start_firmware_upgrade)) {
3719 TRACE_INFO_F(F("Send signal to system Reset...\r\n"));
3720 delay(250); // Waiting security queue empty send HB (Updating start...)
3721 NVIC_SystemReset();
3722 }
3723 }
3724 break;
3725 }
3726
3727 #if (ENABLE_STACK_USAGE)
3728 TaskMonitorStack();
3729 #endif
3730
3731 // Local TaskWatchDog update;
3732 TaskWatchDog(CAN_TASK_WAIT_DELAY_MS);
3733
3734 // Run switch TASK CAN one STEP every...
3735 // If File Uploading MIN TimeOut For Task for Increse Speed Transfer RATE
3736 if(clCanard.master.file.download_request() || param.system_status->flags.file_server_running) {
3737 Delay(Ticks::MsToTicks(TASK_WAIT_REALTIME_DELAY_MS));
3738 }
3739 else
3740 {
3741 Delay(Ticks::MsToTicks(CAN_TASK_WAIT_DELAY_MS));
3742 }
3743 }
3744}

1125 if((millis_standby) < WDT_CONTROLLER_MS / 2) {
1126 param.system_status->tasks[LOCAL_TASK_ID].watch_dog = wdt_flag::set;
1127 } else {
1128 param.system_status->tasks[LOCAL_TASK_ID].watch_dog = wdt_flag::timer;
1129 // Add security milimal Freq to check
1130 param.system_status->tasks[LOCAL_TASK_ID].watch_dog_ms = millis_standby + WDT_CONTROLLER_MS;
1131 }
1132 }
1133 else
1134 param.system_status->tasks[LOCAL_TASK_ID].watch_dog = wdt_flag::set;
1135 param.systemStatusLock->Give();
1136}
